Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "...Maria still hasn't come back. ...I wonder if she's getting scolded by Aunt Rosa again."
Umineko Project (UP): "...Maria hasn't come back. ......I wonder if she's being scolded by Auntie Rosa again."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Maria hasn't come back. ......I wonder if she's been scolded by Rosa oba-san again."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…真里亞、戻ってこねぇな。……また楼座叔母さんに叱られてるのかな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…真里亞、戻ってこねぇな。……また楼座叔母さんに叱られてるのかな」
Russian (RU): "...Мария до сих пор не вернулась. ......Тётя Роза опять её ругает, что ли?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...A Maria ainda não voltou. ......Será que a tia Rosa está repreendendo ela de novo?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…真里亞都不回來呢。……是不是又在挨樓座姑母的罵啊。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…真里亚都不回来呢。……是不是又在挨楼座姑母的骂啊。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Maria non è ancora tornata. ... Mi chiedo se sia stata rimproverata un'altra volta da Rosa oba-san."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Maria non è tornata... Mi chiedo se sia stata rimproverata un'altra volta da zia Rosa."
Turkish (TR): "...Maria hâlâ dönmedi. ......Yine Rosa Teyze tarafından azarlanıp azarlanmadığını merak ediyorum."

Steam (ST): Ever since they'd met Maria at the airport, she'd been romping around, chatting about Halloween the whole time.
Umineko Project (UP): Ever since they had met Maria in the airport, she had constantly been making a huge fuss about Halloween.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since they had met Maria in the airport, she had been romping around about Halloween the whole time.
PC Japanese (JP): 今日の真里亞は、飛行場で出会った時から、ずっとハロウィンハロウィンと大はしゃぎしていた。
Russian (RU): С того времени, как они встретили Марию в аэропорту, она всё время продолжала шуметь про Хэллоуин.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desde que encontraram Maria no aeroporto, ela passou o tempo todo fazendo um alvoroço enorme sobre o Halloween.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 今天的真里亞，打剛到機場的時候起，就一直滿口“萬聖夜萬聖夜”地鬧得很歡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 今天的真里亚，打刚到机场的时候起，就一直满口“万圣夜万圣夜”地闹得很欢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fin da quando avevano incontrato Maria all'aeroporto, lei aveva strepitato tutto il tempo per Halloween.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Maria era costantemente esagitata per Halloween, sin da quando l'avevano incontrata all'aeroporto...
Turkish (TR): Maria ile havaalanında karşılaştığımızdan beri, Maria sürekli olarak Cadılar Bayramı hakkında yaygara koparıp duruyordu.

Steam (ST): ...But maybe she'd cut loose a little too much, acting a little too boisterous on the plane, on the boat, and during lunch, ...because Rosa had cautioned her several times.
Umineko Project (UP): ...But it seemed she had cut loose a little too much, and acted a little too boisterous on the plane, on the boat, and during lunch, because Rosa had warned her several times.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...But maybe she had cut loose a little too much, and acted a little too boisterous on the plane, on the boat, and during lunch, because Rosa had warned her several times.
PC Japanese (JP): …ただ、少々ハメを外しすぎたようで、飛行機の中や船の中、昼食の席でも騒がしくし過ぎ、楼座から何度も注意を受けていた。
Russian (RU): ...Но возможно, она позволила себе слишком много вольностей, и вела себя слишком шумно на самолёте, и на катере, и во время завтрака, поскольку Роза сделала ей несколько замечаний.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Parecia que ela tinha se soltado um pouco demais, e agiu de forma meio barulhenta no avião, no barco e durante o almoço, ...só porque Rosa avisou ela várias vezes para ficar em silêncio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …只不過，她好像有點太興奮了，在飛機上、船上，甚至在午餐的席上都吵鬧過頭了，被樓座提醒了好幾次。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …只不过，她好像有点太兴奋了，在飞机上、船上，甚至在午餐的席上都吵闹过头了，被楼座提醒了好几次。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma forse aveva esagerato un po' troppo facendo baccano sull'aereo, sulla barca, e durante il pranzo, per questo Rosa l'aveva richiamata più volte.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma forse aveva esagerato un po' troppo, e il gran baccano che fece sull'aereo, sulla barca e anche durante il pranzo, la portò a venire richiamata diverse volte da Rosa.
Turkish (TR): ...Ama görünüşe göre biraz ipin ucunu kaçırmış, uçakta, gemide ve öğle yemeğinde gereğinden fazla şımarık davranmıştı, çünkü Rosa onu birkaç kez uyarmıştı.

Steam (ST): At times like that, Aunt Rosa tended not to scold her much in front of people. ...More often, she would take Maria aside and scold her alone.
Umineko Project (UP): In times like that, Auntie Rosa would rarely scold her in front of people.{n}...More commonly, she would call Maria into the shadows, and scold her when they were alone.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In times like that, Rosa oba-san would rarely scold her in front of people....More commonly, she would call Maria into the shadows, and scold her when they were alone.
PC Japanese (JP): そういう時、楼座叔母さんは人前ではあまり叱らない。…大抵、物陰に呼び、二人きりで叱ることが多い。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): そういう時、楼座叔母さんは人前ではあまり叱らない。{n}…大抵、物陰に呼び、二人きりで叱ることが多い。
Russian (RU): В такие моменты тётя Роза редко ругала её на людях.{n}...Скорее всего, она позвала бы Марию в укромное место, и отругала бы её, когда они остались одни.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Em momentos assim, a tia Rosa raramente repreende ela na frente de outras pessoas. ...É mais comum ela chamar a Maria para um local mais vazio e repreender ela quando estão sozinhas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 像這種時候，樓座姑母一般不會在眾人面前斥責她。{n}…基本上都是把她叫到四下無人之處，兩人獨處時教訓她。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 像这种时候，楼座姑母一般不会在众人面前斥责她。{n}…基本上都是把她叫到四下无人之处，两人独处时教训她。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In momenti come quelli, Rosa oba-san raramente la rimprovera di fronte alle persone. ... Più normalmente, la chiama da una parte, e la rimprovera quando sono sole.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In momenti come quelli, zia Rosa raramente la rimproverava in pubblico...{n}Il più del volte la chiamava verso una parte isolata, e la rimproverava quando erano sole.
Turkish (TR): Böyle zamanlarda Rosa Teyze onu insanların önünde nadiren azarlardı.{n}...Genellikle Maria'yı gizlice çağırır ve yalnız kaldıklarında onu azarlardı.

Steam (ST): So, since Maria had been called off somewhere, they figured she must be getting scolded.
Umineko Project (UP): So since Maria had been called off somewhere, they thought she must be getting scolded.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So since Maria had been called off somewhere, they thought she must be getting scolded.
PC Japanese (JP): だから、こうして真里亞が呼び出されたなら、どこかで叱られているに違いないと彼らは考えるのだった。
Russian (RU): А раз Марию куда‐то позвали, они подумали, что она получает нагоняй.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, como a Maria tinha sido chamada para algum lugar, eles pensaram que ela devia estar sendo repreendida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 所以既然真里亞像這樣被叫走了，他們也就覺得，她肯定是被帶到某處挨罵去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以既然真里亚像这样被叫走了，他们也就觉得，她肯定是被带到某处挨骂去了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi dato che Maria era stata chiamata da una parte, loro pensarono che la Madre la stesse sgridando.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quindi pensarono che, se Maria era stata chiamata altrove in quel modo, sicuramente stava venendo sgridata.
Turkish (TR): Bu yüzden, Maria bir yere çağrıldığına göre, şu anda azarlanıyor olmalı diye düşündüler.

Steam (ST): When they looked at the clock, they realized it was almost 6:00. Of course, they couldn't imagine she'd been getting scolded all this time.
Umineko Project (UP): When they looked at the clock, they realized that it was almost six.{n}They couldn't really imagine that Maria had been being scolded this whole time.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When they looked at the clock, they realized that it was almost 6:00. They couldn't really imagine that Maria had been scolded this whole time.
PC Japanese (JP): 時計を見ればもう６時だった。さすがにずっと叱られているとは思わない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 時計を見ればもう６時だった。{n}さすがにずっと叱られているとは思わない。
Russian (RU): Взглянув на часы, они увидели, что те показывают шесть вечера.{n}Трудно было себе представить, что Марию отчитывали всё это время.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando olharam para o relógio, perceberam que já era quase seis.{n}Eles realmente não conseguiam imaginar que Maria estivesse sendo repreendida esse tempo todo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看了下時鐘，已經六點了。{n}總不會是一直罵到了現在。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看了下时钟，已经六点了。{n}总不会是一直骂到了现在。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando guardarono l'orologio, realizzarono che erano quasi le 6:00. {n}Non riuscivano davvero a immaginare che Maria fosse stata rimproverata per tutto questo tempo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando guardarono l'orologio, si erano già le fatte le sei di pomeriggio.{n}Naturalmente, non credevano che Maria stesse venendo rimproverata per tutto questo tempo.
Turkish (TR): Saate baktıklarında saatin neredeyse altı olduğunu fark ettiler.{n}Maria'nın bunca zamandır azarlandığını düşünmek pek de mantıklı gelmiyordu.

Steam (ST): Maybe it was time for some anime she watched every week to start. She probably hadn't left the mansion's parlor.
Umineko Project (UP): Perhaps it had come time for some anime she watched every week to start, or something. She had probably just decided to stay in the mansion's parlor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maybe it was time for some anime she watched every week to start. She had probably stayed in the mansion's parlor the whole time.
PC Japanese (JP): 多分、毎週見ているアニメでも始まる時間ではないだろうか。そのまま屋敷の客間に居付いてしまったのだろう。
Russian (RU): Может быть, началось какое‐нибудь аниме, которое Мария смотрела каждую неделю. Должно быть она всё это время находилась в гостиной особняка.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Talvez tivesse chegado a hora de algum anime que ela assistia toda semana começar, ou algo assim. Provavelmente ela havia decidido ficar na sala de visitas da mansão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 大概是到了她每周都在看的動畫片開播的時間了吧。估計她應該是就這麼待在大屋的客廳裡了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 大概是到了她每周都在看的动画片开播的时间了吧。估计她应该是就这么待在大屋的客厅里了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse era l'ora in cui iniziava qualche anime che lei guardava ogni settimana. Probabilmente era stata nel salotto della villa tutto il tempo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Forse era l'ora in cui iniziava qualche anime che lei guardava ogni settimana. Probabilmente era rimasta ancora nel salotto della villa.
Turkish (TR): Belki de her hafta izlediği bir animenin başlama saati falan gelmişti. Muhtemelen malikanenin salonunda kalmaya karar vermişti.

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Maybe Battler-sama woke up, and they've been playing together."
Umineko Project (UP): "It could be that Battler‐sama has woken up and they are playing together."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Possibly, Battler-sama has woken up and they are playing together."
PC Japanese (JP): 「ひょっとすると、戦人さまがお目覚めになって、一緒に遊ばれているのかもしれませんね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ひょっとすると、戦人さまがお目覚めになって、一緒に遊ばれているのかもしれませんね」
Russian (RU): "Наверно, Баттлер‐сама уже проснулся, и они играют вместе."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É possível que o Battler‐sama tenha acordado e estejam brincando juntos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「也沒准是戰人少爺醒了過來，在陪她一起玩呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「也没准是战人少爷醒了过来，在陪她一起玩呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Forse, Battler-sama si è svegliato e stanno giocando insieme."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Può essere che il signorino Battler si sia svegliato, e che stiano giocando assieme."
Turkish (TR): "Belki Battler-sama uyanmıştır ve birlikte oyun oynuyorlardır."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "After all, Maria-chan thinks of Battler-kun as a new friend. ...She must've had a lot of fun when she played Halloween with Battler-kun at the airport."
Umineko Project (UP): "Well, Maria‐chan must have thought of Battler‐kun as sort of a new friend. ...I'm sure she had tons of fun when she played Halloween with Battler‐kun at the airport."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's because Maria-chan thinks of Battler-kun as a new friend. ...I'm sure it was tons of fun when she played Halloween with Battler-kun at the airport."
PC Japanese (JP): 「真里亞ちゃんにとって、戦人くんは新しい友達のような感じだったろうからね。…その戦人くんと飛行場で、ハロウィンごっこをするのがきっととても楽しかったんだよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「真里亞ちゃんにとって、戦人くんは新しい友達のような感じだったろうからね。…その戦人くんと飛行場で、ハロウィンごっこをするのがきっととても楽しかったんだよ」
Russian (RU): "Это потому, что Мария‐чан думает о Баттлере‐куне, как о новом друге. ...Я уверен, она получила массу удовольствия, когда играла в Хэллоуин с Баттлер‐куном в аэропорту."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Afinal, a Maria‐chan pensa no Battler‐kun como o novo amigo dela. ...Tenho certeza que ela se divertiu muito brincando de Halloween com o Battler‐kun no aeroporto."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「畢竟對小真里亞來說，戰人君應該就像是新交的朋友那種感覺嘛。…她和戰人君在機場玩萬聖夜過家家的時候，肯定很是開心呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「毕竟对小真里亚来说，战人君应该就像是新交的朋友那种感觉嘛。…她和战人君在机场玩万圣夜过家家的时候，肯定很是开心呢。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Questo è perché Maria-chan pensa a Battler-kun come a un nuovo amico. ... Sono sicuro che si sia divertita un sacco quando ha giocato a Halloween con lui all'aeroporto."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Maria-chan pensa che Battler-kun sia come un nuovo amico... Sono sicuro che si sia divertita molto quando ha giocato a fare Halloween con lui all'aeroporto."
Turkish (TR): "Maria-chan, Battler-kun'u yeni bir arkadaş olarak görüyor olmalı. ...Havaalanında Battler-kun ile Cadılar Bayramı oynarken çok eğlendiğine eminim."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Jessica
Steam (ST): "Battler looked like he was having a lot of fun himself. Maybe he's gotten big, but he hasn't changed a bit."
Umineko Project (UP): "Battler was messing around a lot himself. That dude's gotten big, but he hasn't changed a bit on the inside from how he used to be."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Battler was messing around a lot himself. Even though that guy's gotten big, he hasn't changed a bit since long ago."
PC Japanese (JP): 「戦人もずいぶんはしゃいでたな。あいつ、図体はデカくなったってのに、中身は昔っから全然変わらねぇぜ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「戦人もずいぶんはしゃいでたな。あいつ、図体はデカくなったってのに、中身は昔っから全然変わらねぇぜ」
Russian (RU): "Баттлер и сам здорово дурачился. Даже несмотря на то, в какую каланчу он вымахал, с тех давних пор он ничуть не изменился."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O Battler também parecia bem animado. Ele pode ter ficado enorme, mas por dentro não mudou nada do que costumava ser."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「戰人也鬧得夠痛快啊。那傢伙，明明身體都長得那麼大了，內在還是和從前一樣完全沒變嘞。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「战人也闹得够痛快啊。那家伙，明明身体都长得那么大了，内在还是和从前一样完全没变嘞。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Anche Battler stava facendo un sacco di confusione. Nonostante quel ragazzo sia cresciuto, non è cambiato di una virgola."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Anche Battler se la stava spassando un sacco. Sarà pure cresciuto di fisico, ma non è cambiato di una virgola rispetto al passato."
Turkish (TR): "Battler da çok eğleniyormuş gibi duruyordu. Adam kocaman olmuş, ama eski halinin tıpatıp aynısı, içten içe hiç değişmemiş."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "That's true. ...I get the feeling Battler-sama was gracious enough to remain as he was six years ago."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's true. ...I get the feeling that Battler‐sama was gracious enough to remain as he was six years ago."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's true. ...I get the feeling that Battler-sama was gracious enough to remain as he was six years ago."
PC Japanese (JP): 「そうですね。…戦人さまは６年前のままでいて下さった気がします。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうですね。…戦人さまは６年前のままでいて下さった気がします」
Russian (RU): "Согласна. ...У меня такое чувство, будто Баттлер‐сама остался таким же добрым, каким был шесть лет назад."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso é verdade. ...Eu tenho a sensação de que o Battler‐sama foi gracioso o suficiente para permanecer como ele era seis anos atrás."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「說得是呀。…我感覺戰人少爺就跟六年前一模一樣。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「说得是呀。…我感觉战人少爷就跟六年前一模一样。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È vero. ... Ho la sensazione che Battler-sama sia rimasto lo stesso di sei anni fa."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Concordo... Ho l'impressione che il signorino Battler sia rimasto lo stesso di sei anni fa."
Turkish (TR): "Gerçekten de. ...Battler-sama'nın altı yıl önceki hali olarak kalacak kadar kibar olduğunu hissediyorum."

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "Shannon, do you remember what he was like then?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Shannon, you remember how Battler‐kun was six years ago?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Shannon, do you remember about Battler-kun six years ago?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「紗音は６年前の戦人くんのこと、覚えてるんだ？」
Russian (RU): "Шаннон, ты ещё помнишь Баттлера‐куна шесть лет назад?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Shannon, você lembra como o Battler‐kun era seis anos atrás?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「紗音還記得六年前的戰人啊？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「纱音还记得六年前的战人啊？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Shannon, ti ricordi qualcosa del Battler-kun di sei anni fa?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Shannon, tu ricordi com'era Battler-kun sei anni fa?"
Turkish (TR): "Shannon, Battler-kun'un altı yıl önceki halini hatırlıyor musun?"

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Yes. Because he was...well, very energetic. *giggle*."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes. Because he was, well, very energetic. *giggle*."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「えぇ。何しろ、大層お元気な方でしたから。くすくす」

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "I also remember the four of us playing together six years ago. Shannon acted a lot like a big sister back then."
Umineko Project (UP): "I also remember how the four of us used to play six years ago. Shannon acted a lot like a big sister."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「僕も、６年前に４人で遊んだことを思い出すよ。紗音はだいぶお姉さん風だったね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「僕も、６年前に４人で遊んだことを思い出すよ。紗音はだいぶお姉さん風だったね」
Russian (RU): "Я тоже помню, как мы играли шесть лет назад. Шаннон вела себя совсем как старшая сестра."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Também lembro de como nós quatro costumávamos brincar há seis anos atrás. A Shannon parecia muito com uma irmã mais velha."

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il Padrone si diverte a mangiare il suo pasto da solo nello studio, quindi il cibo deve essere sistemato lì. È sempre così.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dato che il padrone preferiva mangiare i suoi pasti da solo nello studio, bisognava andare a disporre la tavola lì. Ma d'altronde, ciò era una ricorrenza costante.
Turkish (TR): Efendi yemeğini çalışma odasında tek başına yemekten hoşlanır, bu sebeple yemek çalışma odasında servis edilmelidir. Elbette anlayacağınız üzere bu yeni bir şey değil.

Steam (ST): Of course Gohda-san would want to set the table for the Master with his own hands, since he'd put his heart and soul into his cooking.
Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san would really like to set the table for the Master with his own hands, as he puts his heart and soul into his cooking.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san really wanted to set the table for the Master with his own hands, as he had put his heart and soul into his cooking.
PC Japanese (JP): 本当なら郷田さんは、自分が精魂込めて作った料理を、自らの手でお館様に配膳したい。
Russian (RU): Годе‐сану очень хотелось собственными руками накрыть стол для господина, поскольку он вкладывал сердце и душу в приготовление своих блюд.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É claro que o Gohda‐san gostaria de pôr a mesa para seu Mestre com suas próprias mãos, assim como ele põe seu coração e sua alma em seus pratos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 說真的，鄉田是非常想將傾注了自己心血做成的料理，親手送到老爺面前的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 说真的，乡田是非常想将倾注了自己心血做成的料理，亲手送到老爷面前的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gohda-san vuole davvero preparare il tavolo per il Padrone con le sue mani, dato che mette anima e corpo nella sua cucina.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Normalmente, Gouda-san avrebbe voluto che i piatti in cui ci metteva tutto se stesso fossero serviti al padrone con le sue stesse mani...
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san, yemeklerine kalbini ve ruhunu kattığı için Efendi'nin sofrasını kendi elleriyle kurmayı gerçekten çok isterdi.

Steam (ST): ...But the Master had imposed a strict rule that none but the servants bearing the Golden Eagle crest enter his study.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But the Master had imposed a strict rule that none but the servants bearing the crest of the Golden Eagle could enter his study.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......But the Master had imposed a strict rule that none but the servants bearing the Golden Eagle crest could enter his study.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかしお館様は、黄金の鷲の紋章を持った使用人しか書斎に入れないという厳しいルールを課されておりました。
Russian (RU): ......Но господин ввёл строгие правила, согласно которым никто, кроме слуг, носящих золотого орла, не мог войти в кабинет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas o Mestre havia imposto uma regra estrita de que ninguém além dos serviçais carregando o brasão da Águia Dourada podiam entrar em seu estúdio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……可是老爺卻定了一條嚴格的規矩，規定只有擁有黃金之鷲紋章的傭人才可以進書房。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……可是老爷却定了一条严格的规矩，规定只有拥有黄金之鹫纹章的佣人才可以进书房。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma il Padrone aveva imposto la severa regola che nessuno tranne i domestici che portavano il simbolo dell'Aquila Dorata potessero entrare nel suo studio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ma il padrone aveva imposto la regola categorica che nessuno potesse entrare nel suo studio, ad eccezione dei domestici che portavano il simbolo dell'aquila dorata...
Turkish (TR): ......Ancak Efendi, Altın Kartal armasını taşıyan hizmetkârlar dışında hiç kimsenin çalışma odasına giremeyeceğine dair katı bir kural koymuştu.

Steam (ST): ......So while Gohda-san would be able to greet the Master from outside the study, not once had he been granted the honor of carrying his cooking inside.
Umineko Project (UP): .........So while Gohda‐san could greet the Master from outside the study, not once had he been granted the honor of carrying his cooking into the study.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): .........So while Gohda-san could greet the Master from outside the study, not once had he been granted the honor of carrying his cooking into the study.
PC Japanese (JP): ………だから郷田さんは、書斎の外でお館様に挨拶することはできても、書斎の中に料理を運ぶという栄誉を与えられたことは一度もなかったのでございます。
Russian (RU): .........Таким образом Года‐сан мог поприветствовать господина за пределами кабинета, но ни разу не удостоился чести принести приготовленные им блюда в его кабинет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Por isso, apesar do Gohda‐san sempre cumprimentar o Mestre de fora de seu estúdio, nem uma vez foi concedido a ele a honra de levar sua culinária para dentro do estúdio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………所以鄉田就算能在書房外向老爺問問好，卻也一次都沒有得到過把料理送進書房的榮譽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………所以乡田就算能在书房外向老爷问问好，却也一次都没有得到过把料理送进书房的荣誉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi mentre Gohda-san poteva salutare il Padrone dall'esterno dello studio, neanche una volta gli fu permesso l'onore di portare ciò che aveva cucinato all'interno dello studio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per questo motivo, nonostante Gouda-san potesse porgere i suoi omaggi al padrone quando egli era fuori dallo studio, non gli fu concesso neanche una volta l'onore di portare la sua cucina all'interno della stanza.
Turkish (TR): .........Gohda-san, Efendi'yi çalışma odasının dışından selamlayabiliyor olsa da, bir kez olsun yemeklerini çalışma odasına taşıma şerefine erişememişti.

Steam (ST): Gohda-san was always irritated by this. ...Of course, he was a newcomer in terms of years of service.
Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san was always unsatisfied with this.{n}...Of course he knows he is a newcomer in terms of years of service.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san was always unsatisfied with this....Of course he was a newcomer in terms of years of service.
PC Japanese (JP): それに郷田さんは常々不満を持っていた。…確かに自分は年季の上では一番の新参者に違いない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それに郷田さんは常々不満を持っていた。{n}…確かに自分は年季の上では一番の新参者に違いない。
Russian (RU): Года‐сан всегда был недоволен этим.{n}...Разумеется, он был новичком с точки зрения количества лет работы на семью Уширомия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Gohda‐san sempre ficava insatisfeito por causa disso. É claro, ele sabe que é um novato em termos de anos de serviço.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田常常對此抱有不滿。{n}…確實自己從工作時間來說，毫無疑問是最晚進右代宮家的新人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田常常对此抱有不满。{n}…确实自己从工作时间来说，毫无疑问是最晚进右代宫家的新人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gohda-san rimaneva sempre insoddisfatto da ciò. ... Ovviamente era un nuovo arrivato in termini di anni di servizio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Gouda-san era costantemente amareggiato da ciò...{n}In termini di anni di servizio, era sicuramente il nuovo arrivato.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san bundan her zaman rahatsız olmuştu.{n}...Elbette burada hizmet verdiği yıllar açısından daha yeni olduğunu biliyordu.

Steam (ST): However, he had piled up plenty of experience from his previous jobs, and he was quite confident that he'd be able to perform in front of Kinzo in a manner that would do him no disservice.
Umineko Project (UP): However, he has accumulated plenty of experience from his previous jobs, and he is strongly confident that he would be able to conduct himself properly, even in front of Kinzo, in a way that would not insult him.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, he had piled up plenty of experience from his previous jobs, and he was strongly confident that he would always be able to perform in front of Kinzo in a way that would not insult him.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、前職で充分な経験と積み重ねを持っており、決して金蔵の前でも失礼のない振る舞いができる強い自信があった。
Russian (RU): Однако он накопил достаточно опыта на своей предыдущей работе, и был твёрдо уверен, что всегда будет готов проявить себя перед Кинзо таким образом, чтобы это не оскорбило его.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, ele acumulou bastante experiência em seus trabalhos anteriores, e possui muita confiança de que seria capaz de servir Kinzo de forma que não causasse nenhum desserviço.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是，他有著從上一份工作中得到的豐富經驗與充足積累，而且他也有著強烈的自信，相信自己即便是在金藏面前也絕不會有所失禮。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是，他有着从上一份工作中得到的丰富经验与充足积累，而且他也有着强烈的自信，相信自己即便是在金藏面前也绝不会有所失礼。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, aveva accumulato molta esperienza dai suoi mestieri precedenti, ed era fortemente convinto che sarebbe stato capace di agire di fronte a Kinzo in maniera che non lo avrebbe insultato.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, aveva accumulato molta esperienza dai suoi precedenti lavori, ed era fermamente convinto di essere capace di mantenere di fronte a Kinzo una condotta che non lo avrebbe oltraggiato.
Turkish (TR): Ancak, daha önceki işlerinden çok fazla deneyim biriktirmişti, ve Kinzo'nun önünde bile, ona saygısızlık etmeyecek şekilde davranabileceğinden kesinlikle emindi.

Steam (ST): And yet, simply because he was not permitted to wear the Golden Eagle, he still hadn't been blessed with this honor.
Umineko Project (UP): And yet, just because he is not permitted the Golden Eagle, he still hasn't been blessed with this honor.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And yet, just because he was not permitted the Golden Eagle, he still hadn't been blessed with this honor.
PC Japanese (JP): なのに、黄金の鷲を許されていないというだけの理由で、自分は未だにその栄誉を賜れない。
Russian (RU): И тем не менее, лишь из‐за того, что ему не доверили золотого орла, он ещё не был удостоен такой чести.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ainda assim, só porque não é permitido a ele usar a Águia Dourada, ele ainda não havia sido abençoado com esta honra.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可儘管如此，僅僅由於不被允許擁有黃金之鷲這一個理由，他還從未獲賜過這個榮譽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可尽管如此，仅仅由于不被允许拥有黄金之鹫这一个理由，他还从未获赐过这个荣誉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ciò nonostante, solo perché non gli era permessa l'Aquila Dorata, non gli era ancora stato conferito questo onore.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ciononostante, non gli era ancora stato conferito tale onore, solamente perché non gli era stata concessa l'aquila dorata...
Turkish (TR): Yine de, sırf Altın Kartalı taşımasına izin verilmediği için, bu onur ona bahşedilmedi.

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): ...Can you imagine what damage that would do to his pride? You might think tonight was a repeat of that, but it wasn't.
Umineko Project (UP): ......You can probably imagine what damage that has done to his pride. You might think that tonight is a mere resurgence of that old argument, but it isn't.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......You can probably imagine what damage that did to his pride. You might think that tonight was another repeat of that, but it wasn't.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それが、彼のプライドをどれほど傷つけていたか想像できるでしょうか。では、今夜も再びそれを蒸し返しているのかというと、そうではありません。
Russian (RU): ......Вы, наверное, можете себе вообразить, как сильно это ущемляло его гордость. Вы, наверное, думаете, что сегодня вечером всё снова будет повторяться, но это не так.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Você consegue imaginar que tipo de dano isso causou ao orgulho dele? Você poderia pensar que essa noite não é nada mais do que uma mera ressurgência dessa velha discussão, mas não é.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……能想像得到，這有多麼地傷害了他的自尊心嗎？那麼如此說來，今晚他是又把此事拿來舊事重提嗎？也並非如此。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……能想象得到，这有多么地伤害了他的自尊心吗？那么如此说来，今晚他是又把此事拿来旧事重提吗？也并非如此。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Si può facilmente immaginare il danno che ciò provocava al suo orgoglio. Si può pensare che stanotte fosse l'ennesima ripetizione di quella scena, ma non lo era.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Riuscite ad immaginare quanto questo lo ferisca nell'orgoglio? Si potrebbe pensare che la cosa si sia ripetuta anche stasera, ma non è questo il caso.
Turkish (TR): ......Bu durumun onun gururuna ne kadar zarar verdiğini tahmin edebilirsiniz. Bu akşam da bunun tekrarlandığını zannedebilirsiniz ama durum öyle değildi.

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): Because tonight, there was a person other than the Master who wanted their food carried to their room.
Umineko Project (UP): Because tonight, there is a person other than the Master who wants their food carried to their room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because tonight, there was a person other than the Master who wanted their food carried to their room.
PC Japanese (JP): 今夜は、お館様の他にも、お部屋まで食事を運んでもらいたいという方がおられるからです。
Russian (RU): Поскольку сегодня вечером присутствовал ещё один человек кроме господина, пожелавший, чтобы еду отнесли к нему в комнату.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porque hoje à noite, há uma pessoa, além do Mestre, que deseja que sua refeição seja servida em seu quarto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 他這麼做，是因為今晚除了老爺以外，還有另一位要把飯菜送到房間裡的人物。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 他这么做，是因为今晚除了老爷以外，还有另一位要把饭菜送到房间里的人物。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché questa notte, c'era un'altra persona oltre al Padrone che voleva il suo pasto portato nella sua camera.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Perché stanotte, oltre al padrone, c'è un'altra persona, la quale vuole il suo pasto portato in camera.
Turkish (TR): Çünkü bu gece, yemeğinin odasına taşınmasını isteyen Efendi'den başka bir kişi daha var.

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): Apparently, this person is an extremely rare and honored guest, and we've been given strict orders to treat them in the same manner as the Master, the Family Head.
Umineko Project (UP): Apparently, this person is a very rare and honored guest, and there has been a strict order to treat this person in the same manner as the Master, the family head.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Apparently, this person was a very rare and honored guest, and there had been a strict order to treat this person in the same manner as the Master, who was the family head.
PC Japanese (JP): その人物は、非常に稀な賓客らしく、当主であるお館様と同格の扱いをするようにきつく厳命されておりました。
Russian (RU): Очевидно, этот человек был очень редким и почитаемым гостем, и поступил строгий наказ обслуживать этого человека так же, как и самого господина, являющегося главой семьи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aparentemente, esta pessoa é uma hóspede muito rara e honrada, e havia uma ordem estrita para tratá‐la da mesma maneira que o Mestre, o chefe da família.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而這位人物，好像是位非常少見的稀客，我們被嚴格命令，要按照與身為當主大人的老爺同等的標準去服侍這位貴客。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而这位人物，好像是位非常少见的稀客，我们被严格命令，要按照与身为当主大人的老爷同等的标准去服侍这位贵客。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Apparentemente, questa persona era un ospite onorato e molto raro, e c'era stato l'ordine severo di trattarla nella stessa maniera del Padrone, che era il capofamiglia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Apparentemente, questa persona è un ospite d'onore di grande eccezione, ed è stato perentoriamente ordinato di trattarla con gli stessi riguardi del padrone, ossia il capofamiglia.
Turkish (TR): Görünüşe göre, bu kişi çok eşsiz ve önemli bir misafir, ve bu kişiye aile reisi olan Efendi ile aynı seviyede davranılması konusunda kesin bir emir var.

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): Gohda-san must have wanted to earn some points by serving this honored guest with his own hands.
Umineko Project (UP): Gohda‐san must have wanted to earn some points by serving this honored guest with his own hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Gohda-san must have wanted to earn some points by serving this honored guest with his own hands.
PC Japanese (JP): 郷田さんは、この賓客に、ぜひ自らの手で配膳してポイントを稼ぎたかったに違いありません。
Russian (RU): Года‐сан, наверное, пытался заработать дополнительные очки, собственноручно обслужив этого почётного гостя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O Gohda‐san certamente quer ganhar alguns pontos servindo esta honorável hóspede com suas próprias mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 鄉田毫無疑問，一定是很想親手把料理送到這位賓客面前，來掙取分數的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 乡田毫无疑问，一定是很想亲手把料理送到这位宾客面前，来挣取分数的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Gohda-san voleva guadagnare qualche punto servendo questo ospite importante con le sue mani.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Gouda-san voleva senz'altro servire lui stesso questa ospite importante, guadagnando così qualche punto di favore.
Turkish (TR): Gohda-san bu onur konuğuna kendi elleriyle hizmet ederek puan kazanmak istemiş olmalı.

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): After all, he was an extremely vain person. If he wasn't qualified to serve the Master, then at least a guest of the same rank...
Umineko Project (UP): Because he is a person of strong vanity. If he isn't qualified to serve the Master, then at least a guest of the same rank...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because he was a person of strong vanity. If he wasn't qualified to serve the Master, then at least a guest of the same rank...
PC Japanese (JP): 虚栄心のお強い方でございますから。お館様に配膳する資格はなくても、せめてそれと同格の来客には…。
Russian (RU): Поскольку он был человеком с сильным тщеславием. Если уж его не допускали до служения господину, то уж хотя бы гостя такого же уровня...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Afinal, ele é uma pessoa extremamente vaidosa. Se ele não é qualificado para servir o Mestre, então ao menos um hóspede da mesma posição...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 畢竟他是個虛榮心很強的人。哪怕沒有送到老爺面前的資格，他也想至少爭取一下與老爺同級別的客人的…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 毕竟他是个虚荣心很强的人。哪怕没有送到老爷面前的资格，他也想至少争取一下与老爷同级别的客人的…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Perché era una persona dalla grande vanità. Se non era qualificato per servire il Padrone, allora almeno un ospite di pari grado...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopotutto, è una persona estremamente vanitosa. Se non era qualificato per preparare la tavola al padrone, almeno si sarebbe rifatto con un ospite di pari rango...
Turkish (TR): Çünkü o çok gururlu bir insan. Efendi'ye hizmet etmeye uygun değilse, en azından aynı seviyedeki bir konuğa hizmet etmek istemişti...

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): He simply couldn't find time during lunch, so Kanon-san had gone in his place. ...So, he truly desired to personally serve this person tonight's meal, the best dinner of the year.
Umineko Project (UP): He simply couldn't make time during lunch, so Kanon‐san had gone for him. ...Therefore, he truly desired to serve tonight's food personally—the best dinner of the year.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): He couldn't have made time during lunch no matter what, so Kanon-san had gone for him....Therefore, he truly desired to serve tonight's food, the best dinner of the year.
PC Japanese (JP): 昼食はどうしても手が空かず、嘉音さんに行ってもらった。…だから、一年で最高の晩餐である今夜の食事を、ぜひ自分の手で配膳したかったのです。
Russian (RU): У него не хватило времени во время ланча, поэтому вместо него пошёл Канон‐сан. ...Таким образом, он действительно желал подать сегодняшние блюда, лучший обед года.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ele simplesmente não conseguiu arranjar tempo durante o almoço, então o Kanon‐san havia ido para ele. ...Por isso, ele verdadeiramente desejava servir a refeição desta noite pessoalmente — o melhor jantar do ano.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 午飯時由於他怎麼都騰不出手來，只好讓嘉音去了。…因此今晚這一年中最為豪華的晚餐，他無論如何都想由自己親手送去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 午饭时由于他怎么都腾不出手来，只好让嘉音去了。…因此今晚这一年中最为豪华的晚餐，他无论如何都想由自己亲手送去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non aveva potuto fare in tempo durante il pranzo, quindi Kanon era andato al posto suo. ... Pertanto, desiderava veramente servire il pasto di quella notte, la migliore cena dell'anno.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Non essendo riuscito a liberarsi per il pranzo, era andato Kanon-san al suo posto... Pertanto, quella sera voleva assolutamente essere lui in persona a servire la cena, la quale sarebbe stata il miglior pasto dell'anno.
Turkish (TR): Öğle yemeği sırasında zaman ayıramadığı için Kanon-san onun yerine gitmişti. ...Dolayısıyla, bu akşamın—yılın en iyi—yemeğini bizzat kendisi servis etmeyi çok istiyordu.

Speaker: Kumasawa Chiyo
Steam (ST): But Genji-san had put a stop to that.

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro

Steam (ST): Gohda's pride was always horribly injured by this ranking system. ...At times like this, he'd speak out bluntly and rudely against Shannon and Kanon.

Steam (ST): Kanon remembered that he and Shannon had different impressions of {f:5:Beatrice}. To Shannon, {f:5:Beatrice} was a cupid of love, who had granted her magic to establish her relationship with George.
Umineko Project (UP): Kanon remembered that he and Shannon had different impressions of {f:5:Beatrice}. To Shannon, {f:5:Beatrice} was a cupid of love, who had granted her magic to create her relationship with George.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kanon remembered that he and Shannon had different impressions about Beatrice. To Shannon, Beatrice was a cupid of love, who had granted her magic to create her relationship with George.
PC Japanese (JP): 嘉音は、自分と紗音ではベアトリーチェに対して持っている印象が違ったことを思い出す。紗音にとって魔女は、自分と譲治の仲を取り持つ魔法を授けてくれた、恋のキューピッドなのだ。
Russian (RU): Канон вспомнил, что он и Шаннон были противоположного мнения о {f:5:Беатриче}. Для Шаннон {f:5:Беатриче} была купидоном любви, которая помогла своим волшебством привести к возникновению её отношений с Джорджем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Kanon lembrou que ele e Shannon tinham impressões diferentes de {f:5:Beatrice}. Para Shannon, {f:5:Beatrice} era um cupido do amor, que havia concedido sua magia para estabelecer o relacionamento dela com George.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 嘉音想起，自己和紗音對貝阿朵莉切抱有的印象是不一樣的。對紗音來說，魔女就是那賜予了她與讓治結緣的魔法的愛神丘比特。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 嘉音想起，自己和纱音对贝阿朵莉切抱有的印象是不一样的。对纱音来说，魔女就是那赐予了她与让治结缘的魔法的爱神丘比特。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Kanon si ricordò che lui e Shannon avevano diverse impressioni su Beatrice. {n}Per Shannon, Beatrice era un cupido d'amore, che aveva usato la magia per creare la sua relazione con George.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Kanon si ricordò che lui e Shannon avevano avuto impressioni differenti su {f:5:Beatrice}. Per Shannon, la strega era una dea dell'amore, che aveva conferito la sua magia affinché essa mediasse tra lei e George.
Turkish (TR): Kanon, kendisinin ve Shannon'un {f:5:Beatrice} hakkında farklı izlenimlere sahip olduklarını hatırladı. Shannon'a göre, {f:5:Beatrice}, George ile ilişkisini yaratması için ona büyü bahşeden bir aşk tanrısıydı.

Steam (ST): ...The nebulous witch that only they'd been able to see in the past...had now revived so fully that she could walk in openly through the front door... and even have dinner carried to her.

PC Japanese (JP): ……かつて自分たちにしか姿の見えなかった、希薄な魔女は、今や玄関から堂々とやってきて、夕食を運ばせるほどの存在に復活したのだ。
Russian (RU): ......Та призрачная ведьма, которую лишь ему и Шаннон удавалось видеть в прошлом, теперь открыто вошла через парадную дверь, и достаточно возродилась для того, чтобы они могли подносить ей еду.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Aquela bruxa rarefeita que, no passado, apenas eles podiam ver, agora havia renascido, de tal forma que era capaz de passar livremente pela porta da frente, e ter ainda seu jantar sido trazido até ela por eles.

Chinese Simplified (CN): ……曾经只有他们二人能得看到身姿的，那个存在感稀薄的魔女，如今已从大门光明正大地走进了屋来，复活成了一个，能差遣人为她送晚饭的存在了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quella strega indistinta che solo loro erano stati capaci di vedere in passato, ora era entrata direttamente dalla porta principale, ed era resuscitata abbastanza da fare in modo che le venisse portato del cibo da loro.

Turkish (TR): ......Geçmişte sadece onlar tarafından görülebilen o belirsiz cadı, şimdi ön kapıdan açıkça içeri girmişti, ve artık ona yemek götürebilecekleri kadar canlıydı.

Russian (RU): "Жертвами будут избраны 13 человек. И лишь пятеро останутся в живых. ...Шансы на то, что мы окажемся частью этой группы, действительно невелики. ......Однако только если ты, нээ‐сан, сможешь воспользоваться тем обещанием, то шансы возрастут! Я бы хотел рискнуть, сделав эту ставку!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Treze pessoas serão sacrificadas. Apenas cinco serão deixadas vivas.{n}...As chances de ambos estarmos nesse grupo são realmente escassas. ......Porém, se ao menos você puder tirar vantagem dessa promessa, essas chances aumentam! Eu quero fazer essa aposta!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「有十三人會成為活祭。能活下來的只有五人。…我們兩個能同時包括在其中的概率真的很低。……但哪怕只有姐姐能得到這保證，概率也會高上不少！我想賭一把！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「有十三人会成为活祭。能活下来的只有五人。…我们两个能同时包括在其中的概率真的很低。……但哪怕只有姐姐能得到这保证，概率也会高上不少！我想赌一把！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tredici persone verranno sacrificate. Solo cinque persone saranno lasciate in vita. Ci sono pochissime possibilità che noi rientreremo in quel gruppo. ... Tuttavia, se solo tu, Nee-san, sfrutterai quella promessa, queste possibilità aumenteranno! Voglio partecipare a questa scommessa!
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Verranno sacrificate tredici persone. Ne rimarranno in vita soltanto cinque...{n}Ci sono pochissime probabilità che noi rientreremo in quel gruppo... Ma basterà che tu sfrutti quella promessa, sorella, e le nostre chance aumenteranno! Sono disposto a rischiare!"
Turkish (TR): "On üç kişi kurban edilecek. Sadece beş kişi hayatta kalacak. ...İkimizin de o grubun bir parçası olma şansı gerçekten çok düşük. ......Ancak, en azından bu vaatten faydalanabilirsen, bu ihtimal yükselir! Bu bahse girmek istiyorum!"

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "Our salvation is in the Golden Land. We're gonna reach that place and gain humanity. And then, I want to live life as a human, together with you, Nee-san...! If we do that, we might be able to find... ...true love!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Our salvation is in the Golden Land. If we can make it that far, we can become human. And I want to walk through life as a human, together with you, Nee‐san...! If we do that, we might even be able to achieve......true love!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Our salvation is in the Golden Land. If we can make it that far, we can become human. And I want to walk through life as a human, together with you, Nee-san...! If we do that, we might be able to achieve, ......true love!"
PC Japanese (JP): 黄金郷には救いがある。僕たちはそこへ辿り着き、人間を手に入れるんだ。そして姉さんと二人で、人間としての人生を歩みたいんだよ…！　そうすれば、本当の恋だって、……できるかもしれない！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「黄金郷には救いがある。僕たちはそこへ辿り着き、人間を手に入れるんだ。そして姉さんと二人で、人間としての人生を歩みたいんだよ…！　そうすれば、本当の恋だって、……できるかもしれない！」
Russian (RU): "Наше спасение находится в Золотой Земле. Если нам удастся проделать такой путь, мы сможем стать людьми. И я хочу идти по жизни как человек вместе с тобой, нээ‐сан! Если мы сделаем это, то можем заполучить настоящую любовь!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nossa salvação está na Terra Dourada. Se nós chegarmos lá, poderemos nos tornar humanos. Eu quero andar pela vida como um humano, junto com você, nee‐san...! Se fizermos isso, podemos até ser capazes de alcançar......o amor verdadeiro!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「黃金鄉之中有著救贖。我們是能夠到達那裡，成為人類的。然後我想和姐姐兩個人一起，去走上身為人類的人生…！如此一來，就連真正的戀愛，……或許也可以談得到！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「黄金乡之中有着救赎。我们是能够到达那里，成为人类的。然后我想和姐姐两个人一起，去走上身为人类的人生…！如此一来，就连真正的恋爱，……或许也可以谈得到！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La nostra salvezza è nella Terra Dorata. Se possiamo arrivare fin lì, possiamo diventare umani. E voglio poter vivere la mia vita come un essere umano, assieme a te, Nee-san...! Se ci riusciamo, potremmo ottenere... il vero amore!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "La nostra salvezza risiede nella Terra Dorata. Arrivati lì, guadagneremo la nostra umanità... E voglio vivere la mia vita da essere umano assieme a te, sorella...! Se ci riuscissimo, potremmo ottenere... il vero amore!"
Turkish (TR): "Kurtuluşumuz Altın Diyar'da. Eğer oraya kadar dayanabilirsek, insan olabiliriz. Ve Nee-san, seninle birlikte, bir insan olarak hayatımı sürdürmek istiyorum...! Eğer bunu yaparsak, belki de gerçek aşkı bile......elde edebiliriz!"

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "............ ...In the past, we used to dream about being able to go to the Golden Land. ......If we go there, any wish will be granted. ......We'll be saved from this pain. ......That's what we believed."
Umineko Project (UP): ".............................. ...We used to dream about being able to go to the Golden Land, didn't we? .........If we go there, any wish will be granted. .........We will be saved from this pain. ............We believed that."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...........................In the past, we used to dream about being able to go to the Golden Land. .........If we go there, any wish will be granted. .........We will be saved from this pain. ............We believed that."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………………………。…かつての私たちは、黄金郷へ行けることを夢見てたね。………そこへ行けば、どんな願いでも叶う。………私たちをこの苦しみから救ってくれる。…………そう信じてた。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………………………。…かつての私たちは、黄金郷へ行けることを夢見てたね。………そこへ行けば、どんな願いでも叶う。………私たちをこの苦しみから救ってくれる。…………そう信じてた」
Russian (RU): "........................ ...В прошлом мы мечтали, как сможем войти в Золотую Землю. .........Если мы отправимся туда, любое желание сможет исполниться. .........Мы сможем спастись от этой боли. ............Мы верили в это."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".............................. ...Nós costumávamos sonhar em sermos capazes de ir à Terra Dourada, não é? .........Se formos lá, qualquer desejo será concedido. .........Seremos salvos desta dor. ............Nós acreditamos nisso."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………………………。…曾經的我們，是有夢想過能夠前往黃金鄉呢。………只要到了那裡，無論什麼願望就都能實現。………能把我們從這苦難中拯救出來。…………我們是曾如此相信過。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………………………。…曾经的我们，是有梦想过能够前往黄金乡呢。………只要到了那里，无论什么愿望就都能实现。………能把我们从这苦难中拯救出来。…………我们是曾如此相信过。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... In passato, sognavamo di poter raggiungere la Terra Dorata. ... Se ci rechiamo lì, ogni desiderio verrà realizzato. ... Verremo salvati da questo dolore. ... Noi ci credevamo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...In passato, noi sognavamo di poter raggiungere la Terra Dorata...{n}Se arrivassimo lì, ogni nostro desiderio verrebbe esaudito... E verremo salvati da questo dolore... Questo era quello in cui credevamo."
Turkish (TR): ".............................. ...Eskiden hep Altın Diyar'a gidebilmeyi hayal ederdik, değil mi? .........Oraya gidersek, her dileğimiz kabul olur. .........Bu acıdan kurtarılacağız. ............Buna inanmıştık."

Steam (ST): However, in this ceremony, only a few people would be invited to the Golden Land, chosen by fate and chance. ...Everyone else would lose their life as a sacrifice midway through the ceremony.
Umineko Project (UP): However, in this ritual, only a few people, chosen by fate and chance, would be invited to the Golden Land. ......Everyone else would lose their life as a sacrifice midway through the ceremony.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, in this ceremony, only a few people, decided by fate and chance, would be invited to the Golden Land.......Everyone else would lose their life as a sacrifice midway through the ceremony.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし儀式は、運命と偶然に選ばれた者を数人しか黄金郷へ招かない。……他は全て、儀式の途中で生贄として命を落とす。
Russian (RU): Однако по правилам этого ритуала лишь несколько человек, по велению судьбы и случая, будут приглашены в Золотую Землю. ......Все остальные лишатся жизни, став жертвами во время ритуала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, nesta cerimônia, apenas algumas pessoas serão convidadas para a Terra Dourada, escolhidas pelo destino e contingência. ......Todos os outros perderão suas vidas sendo sacrificados durante a cerimônia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可是這儀式，只會把由命運與偶然選中的寥寥幾人招待進黃金鄉。……其他的所有人，都會在儀式過程中成為活祭失去性命。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可是这仪式，只会把由命运与偶然选中的寥寥几人招待进黄金乡。……其他的所有人，都会在仪式过程中成为活祭失去性命。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, in questa cerimonia, solo poche persone, prescelte dal fato e dalla possibilità, saranno invitate alla Terra Dorata. ... Tutti gli altri perderanno la vita come sacrifici durante la cerimonia.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, all'interno della cerimonia, solo poche persone, prescelte dal fato e dalla buona sorte, sarebbero state invitate nella Terra Dorata... Tutti gli altri, in quanto sacrifici, avrebbero perso la propria vita nel corso del rituale.
Turkish (TR): Ancak, bu ritüelde, sadece kaderin ve şansın seçtiği birkaç kişi, Altın Diyar'a davet edilecekti. ......Diğer herkes ritüel sırasında kurban olarak hayatını kaybedecekti.

Steam (ST): However, in the past, Shannon and Kanon had thought that whether they reached the Golden Land or were sacrificed, they would still be released from their duties as furniture.
Umineko Project (UP): But in the past, Shannon and Kanon had thought...that whether they reached the Golden Land or were made sacrifices, it would be all the same, because they would be released from their duties as furniture either way.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, in the past, Shannon and Kanon had thought that whether they reached the Golden Land, or were made sacrifices, they would still be released from their duties as furniture.
PC Japanese (JP): だが、かつての紗音と嘉音は、黄金郷へ辿り着けようとも、生贄にされようとも、どちらにせよ家具の役目から解放されるものだと思っていた。
Russian (RU): Вот только в прошлом Шаннон и Канон полагали, что по достижении Золотой Земли или же, став жертвами ритуала, они всё едино освободятся от своих обязанностей в качестве мебели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entretanto, no passado, Shannon e Kanon haviam pensado...que se eles alcançassem a Terra Dourada ou fossem sacrificados, não faria diferença, pois eles seriam liberados de seus deveres como mobílias da mesma forma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，過去的紗音與嘉音都認為，無論是抵達了黃金鄉，還是被選為了活祭，都能把自己從家具的使命中解放出來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，过去的纱音与嘉音都认为，无论是抵达了黄金乡，还是被选为了活祭，都能把自己从家具的使命中解放出来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Però, in passato, Shannon e Kanon avevano pensato che sia che avessero raggiunto la Terra Dorata, sia che fossero stati sacrificati, sarebbero comunque stati liberati dai loro doveri da mobili.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Però, Shannon e Kanon in passato avevano pensato che, sia se fossero riusciti a raggiungere la Terra Dorata, che se fossero stati sacrificati, sarebbero comunque stati esentati dai loro doveri da mobili...
Turkish (TR): Ancak geçmişte Shannon ve Kanon...Altın Diyar'a ulaşsalar da kurban edilseler de her şeyin aynı olacağını, çünkü her iki durumda da mobilya olarak görevlerinden serbest kalacaklarını düşünmüşlerdi.

Steam (ST): ...That meant this ceremony would definitely bring release to furniture like them, no matter what happened.
Umineko Project (UP): ......So, in short, the ritual had been something that would definitely grant release to furniture like them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......So in other words, this ceremony would definitely give release to furniture like them.
PC Japanese (JP): ……だからつまり、家具である自分たちにとって、儀式は必ず解放を与えてくれるものだった。
Russian (RU): ......Другими словами, этот ритуал, так или иначе, несомненно принёс бы свободу такой мебели, как они.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Então, em suma, esta cerimônia seria algo que definitivamente concederia a eles {i:sua libertação do papel de mobília}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……所以換言之，對身為家具的他們來說，這儀式一定會給予自己解放。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……所以换言之，对身为家具的他们来说，这仪式一定会给予自己解放。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quindi in altre parole, questa cerimonia avrebbe sicuramente dato la libertà a dei mobili come loro.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per cui, in altre parole, la cerimonia avrebbe sicuramente conferito la libertà a dei mobili come loro.
Turkish (TR): ......Yani kısacası, ritüel onlar gibi mobilyaların kesinlikle kurtuluşa ermelerini sağlayacak bir şeydi.

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "I don't like it. ...Together with you, I want to make up for all the suffering we've endured. I won't become a sacrifice. Nee-san and I will remain alive. And we'll reach the Golden Land together."
Umineko Project (UP): "I don't like it. ......Together with you, I want to take back all the hard times we had. I won't become a sacrifice. You and I will remain alive. And we'll reach the Golden Land together."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I don't like it. ......I want to take back everything painful that we lost until now, together with you, Nee-san. I won't become a sacrifice. Nee-san and I will remain alive. And we'll reach the Golden Land together."
PC Japanese (JP): 「僕は嫌だ。……これまでの辛かった分を、姉さんと取り戻したい。生贄なんてごめんだ。僕と姉さんは生き残る。そして二人で黄金郷へ辿り着く。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「僕は嫌だ。……これまでの辛かった分を、姉さんと取り戻したい。生贄なんてごめんだ。僕と姉さんは生き残る。そして二人で黄金郷へ辿り着く」
Russian (RU): "Мне это не нравится. ......Всё то, что причинило нам боль в прошлом и чего мы лишились, я хочу забрать всё это вместе с тобой, нээ‐сан. Я не стану жертвой. Мы с тобой выживем и вместе отправимся в Золотую Землю."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu não gosto disso. ......Junto com você, quero revidar todos os tempos difíceis que tivemos. Eu não me tornarei um sacrifício. Você e eu permaneceremos vivos. E alcançaremos a Terra Dourada juntos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我不甘心。……我想和姐姐一起，拿回迄今為止經歷過的種種辛酸的回報。我才不要去做什麼活祭。我和姐姐會活下來。然後兩人一起到達黃金鄉。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我不甘心。……我想和姐姐一起，拿回迄今为止经历过的种种辛酸的回报。我才不要去做什么活祭。我和姐姐会活下来。然后两人一起到达黄金乡。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non mi piace. ... Voglio riprendermi tutte le cose che abbiamo perso soffrendo fino ad ora insieme a te, Nee-san. Non diventerò un sacrificio. Nee-san e io resteremo vivi. E raggiungeremo la Terra Dorata assieme."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Io non lo accetto... Voglio rifarmi insieme a te di tutto il dolore che abbiamo subito. Non voglio diventare un sacrificio. Io e te sopravviveremo, sorella.{n}E insieme raggiungeremo la Terra Dorata..."
Turkish (TR): "Bundan hoşlanmadım. ......Seninle birlikte, çektiğimiz tüm acıları telafi etmek istiyorum. Kurban olmayacağım. Nee-san sen ve ben hayatta kalacağız. Ve Altın Diyar'a birlikte ulaşacağız."

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "......So I won't let you become the sacrifice of the second twilight! Please, Nee-san! Don't accept that man's ring! If you don't accept it, she promised not to select you as a sacrifice!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "............So I won't let you become the sacrifice for the second twilight! Please, Nee‐san! Don't accept that man's ring! If you don't accept it, she promised not to select you as a sacrifice!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ".........So I won't let you become the sacrifice of the second twilight! Please, Nee-san! Don't accept that man's ring! If you don't accept that, she promised not to select you as a sacrifice, Nee-san!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………だから姉さんを、第二の晩の生贄になんかさせない！　頼むよ姉さん！　あの男の指輪を受け取らないで！　それを受け取らなければ、あいつは姉さんを生贄には選ばないと約束してくれた！！」
Russian (RU): ".........Поэтому я не позволю тебе стать жертвой вторых сумерек! Умоляю, нээ‐сан! Не принимай кольцо этого мужчины! Нээ‐сан, если ты не согласишься, она не сдержит своё обещание не выбирать тебя в качестве жертвы!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Por isso, eu não deixarei que você se torne um sacrifício para o segundo crepúsculo! Por favor, nee‐san! Não aceite o anel daquele homem! Se você não aceitá‐lo, ela prometeu que não a escolheria como sacrifício!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………所以我不會讓姐姐，去成為什麼第二晚的活祭！求你了姐姐！不要去接受那個男人的戒指！那傢伙保證了，只要不收下那戒指，就不選姐姐做活祭！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………所以我不会让姐姐，去成为什么第二晚的活祭！求你了姐姐！不要去接受那个男人的戒指！那家伙保证了，只要不收下那戒指，就不选姐姐做活祭！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Per questo non ti lascerò diventare uno dei sacrifici del secondo crepuscolo! Per favore, Nee-san! Non accettare l'anello di quell'uomo! Lei ha promesso di non sceglierti come sacrificio, se non lo accetterai, Nee-san!!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Per questo non ti lascerò diventare uno dei sacrifici del secondo crepuscolo!{n}Ti scongiuro, sorella! Non accettare l'anello di quell'uomo! Ha promesso di non sceglierti come sacrificio se non lo accetterai!!"
Turkish (TR): "............Bu yüzden Nee-san, ikinci alacakaranlığın kurbanı olmana izin vermeyeceğim! Lütfen, Nee-san! O adamın yüzüğünü kabul etme! Eğer kabul etmezsen, seni kurban olarak seçmeyeceğine söz verdi!!"

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): ".........I...cannot do that. ...Tonight's ring is very special. ...My heart won't let me refuse it."
Umineko Project (UP): ".....................That's......something I can't do. ......Tonight's ring is very special. ......My heart...won't permit me to not accept it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "..................I, ......cannot do that. ......Tonight's ring is very special. ......My heart won't permit me to not accept it."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………………それは、……できないよ。……今夜の指輪はとても特別なもの。……それを受け取らないことは、…私の心が許さない」
Russian (RU): "..................Я... не могу так поступить. ......Сегодняшнее кольцо имеет особое значение. ......Моё сердце не позволит мне отказать ему."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………………这我，……做不到。……今晚的戒指是非常特别的东西。……我的心不允许我，…不去接受它。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Io... non posso farlo. ... L'anello di stasera è molto speciale. ... Il mio cuore non mi permetterà di rifiutarlo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Io... non posso farlo... L'anello di stasera sarà molto speciale... Il mio cuore... non mi permetterà di rifiutarlo."
Turkish (TR): ".....................Bu......yapamayacağım bir şey. ......Bu geceki yüzük çok özel. ......Kalbim...onu reddetmeme izin vermiyor."

Speaker: Kanon
Steam (ST): "Nee-san...! The sacrifices of the ceremony are decided on the witch's whims! And that witch has promised to overlook just you, Nee-san!! You alone will definitely be able to go to the Golden Land!"

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "I entrusted Kanon with lunch, but it should have been you, as the next in rank after me, who carried it. ......{f:5:Beatrice}-sama is the most honored guest of this house. There is no more honored guest than her. ...Please think of her as another Master, and be polite."

PC Japanese (JP): 「昼食は嘉音に頼んだが、本来は私の次の序列のお前が運ぶべきものだ。………ベアトリーチェさまは当家の最高の賓客だ。それ以上の賓客はいない。……もう一人のお館様と思い、丁重に頼む。」

Russian (RU): "Я поручил Канону принести ланч, но именно тебе, находящейся после меня по статусу, надлежало принести его. .........{f:5:Беатриче}‐сама наиболее почитаемая гостья в этом доме. Здесь нет более почитаемой гостьи, кроме неё. ......Пожалуйста, думай о ней как о другом господине и будь вежлива."

Não há hóspede mais honrado que ela. ......Peço que pense nela como outra Mestra, e seja educada."

Ondan daha önemli bir konuk yoktur. ......Lütfen onu malikanenin bir başka Efendisi olarak düşün ve kibar ol."

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "...Please, take extra care that you make no blunders, understand? It is quite painful for me to entrust this to someone as inexperienced as yourself, but there's nothing we can do about the house's rules. ...Carry out your duties with the utmost of care."
Umineko Project (UP): "...I must impress upon you once again—please be very careful not to make any blunders. It is quite painful for me to entrust this to someone inexperienced as yourself, but there's nothing we can do about the house's rules. ......I am sincerely counting on you."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Is that alright? I sincerely ask that you make no blunders. It is quite painful for me to entrust this to someone inexperienced as yourself, but there's nothing we can do about the house's rules. ......I am sincerely counting on you."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…よろしいですか、くれぐれも粗相のないようにお願いしますよ。経験の未熟なあなたに託すのは非常に心苦しいですが、当家のルールとあっては仕方ありません。……くれぐれも頼みますよ。」

Russian (RU): "...Всё ли в порядке? Я искренне прошу тебя не допускать грубых ошибок. Мне больно доверять это задание такому новичку, как ты, но мы ничего не можем поделать с правилами дома. ......Я искренне надеюсь на тебя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Devo reforçar mais uma vez a você — por favor, seja muito cuidadosa para não cometer nenhum equívoco. É bem doloroso para mim confiar isto a alguém inexperiente como você, mas não há nada que possamos fazer sobre as regras da casa. ......Estou sinceramente contando com você."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…你聽好了，拜託你千萬不要有閃失。雖然把這活兒托付給經驗不足的你來做，讓鄙人非常不安，但畢竟這是本宅的規矩，鄙人也沒有辦法。……你可得千萬小心著。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…你听好了，拜托你千万不要有闪失。虽然把这活儿托付给经验不足的你来做，让鄙人非常不安，但毕竟这是本宅的规矩，鄙人也没有办法。……你可得千万小心着。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Capisci? Ti chiedo dal profondo di non fare errori. È doloroso per me dover affidare quest'incarico a qualcuno inesperto come te, ma non possiamo andare contro le regole di questa casa. ... Conto sinceramente su di te."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Ti chiedo umilmente di non commettere errori, d'accordo? Dover affidare quest'incarico a un'inesperta come te mi affligge immensamente, ma non possiamo andare contro le regole di questa casa... Facciamo tutti grande affidamento su di te."

Steam (ST): Gohda had officially agreed, but he glared at Shannon with an expression that told her he definitely wouldn't forgive any mistakes.

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "...Your meal has been prepared so that it might be carried to the study. ...However, Krauss-sama has expressed his wish that you eat downstairs tonight..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Your meal has been prepared so that it may be carried to the study. ...However, Krauss‐sama wishes for you to go downstairs tonight..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......Your meal has been prepared so that it may be carried to the study. ...However, Krauss-sama said that he wanted you to go downstairs tonight..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……お食事は書斎へ運べるよう準備しております。…ただ、蔵臼さまが、今夜はどうか下へ降りていただきたいと…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……お食事は書斎へ運べるよう準備しております。…ただ、蔵臼さまが、今夜はどうか下へ降りていただきたいと…」
Russian (RU): "......Ваша трапеза уже готова и может быть доставлена в кабинет. ...Однако Краусс‐сама сказал, что хотел бы, чтобы вы спустились сегодня вечером..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sua refeição foi preparada e deve estar a caminho de seu estúdio. ...Porém, o Krauss‐sama deseja que você desça as escadas esta noite para jantar..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……飯菜已經準備好了，隨時可以送進書房。…只是，藏臼先生說了，今晚無論如何都想請老爺去下面一趟…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……饭菜已经准备好了，随时可以送进书房。…只是，藏臼先生说了，今晚无论如何都想请老爷去下面一趟…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Il suo pasto è stato preparato così da poter essere portato all'interno dello studio. ... Tuttavia, Krauss-sama avrebbe voluto che lei si recasse al piano inferiore stasera..."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Il suo pasto è stato preparato in modo da poter essere portato all'interno dello studio... Tuttavia, il signor Klaus gradirebbe molto se lei stasera scendesse al piano di sotto...
Turkish (TR): "......Yemeğiniz çalışma odasına getirilmek üzere hazırlandı. ...Ancak, Krauss-sama bu akşam aşağıya inmenizi istiyor..."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Steam (ST): "Father, I'm not asking you to do this every day. Just for this one night, won't you gather together with your family?"
Umineko Project (UP): "Father. I don't mean every day. Even if it's just for tonight, won't you gather together with your family?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「お父さん。毎日とは言いません。せめて今夜だけでも、家族で揃ってはくれませんか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お父さん。毎日とは言いません。せめて今夜だけでも、家族で揃ってはくれませんか」
Russian (RU): "Отец. Я не прошу тебя спускаться каждый день. Разве ты не можешь хотя бы сегодня собраться вместе со своей семьёй?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Pai. Não estou pedindo para que faça isso todos os dias. Mesmo que seja só esta noite, você não pode se reunir com sua família?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「爸。我不說每天。至少只是今晚也好，就不能跟家人團聚一下嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「爸。我不说每天。至少只是今晚也好，就不能跟家人团聚一下吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Papà. Non voglio dire ogni giorno. Ma non ti uniresti alla tua famiglia anche solo per stasera?"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Padre. Non ti sto chiedendo di farlo ogni giorno. Ma almeno stasera, non potresti unirti alla tua famiglia?"
Turkish (TR): "Baba. Her gün gel demiyorum. Sadece bu akşam için bile olsa, ailen ile bir araya gelmeyecek misin?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Who are you calling family!! Since when have you considered vultures circling in wait for roadkill to be family?! Would you call rotting, oozing maggots family as well?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Who are you calling family!! When did you start calling those vultures who wait for me to collapse and die family?! When did you start calling rotting, gushing maggots FAMILY?!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Who are you calling family!! When did you start calling those vultures who wait for me to collapse and die family?! Have you started calling rotting, gushing maggots family?!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「誰が家族かッ！！　貴様はいつから行き倒れを待つハゲタカたちを家族と呼ぶようになったのか！　腐りて湧き出す蛆虫を家族と呼ぶようになったのかッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Что ты называешь семьёй?! Когда это ты стал называть тех стервятников, ожидающих, когда я слягу и умру, семьёй?! Ты стал называть червей, паразитирующих на гнили, семьёй?!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Quem você está chamando de família?! Desde quando você começou a chamar aqueles abutres que me esperam cair e morrer de família?! Você chama coisas apodrecidas jorrando larvas de {b:família}?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「誰算我家人！！你是從什麼時候開始把等著人病死的禿鷲們叫成家人的！把腐肉裡冒出來的蛆虫叫成家人的！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「谁算我家人！！你是从什么时候开始把等着人病死的秃鹫们叫成家人的！把腐肉里冒出来的蛆虫叫成家人的！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Chi stai chiamando famiglia!! Quando hai iniziato a chiamare famiglia quegli avvoltoi che non aspettano altro che io cada a terra e muoia?! Hai iniziato a chiamare quei putridi vermi strepitanti famiglia?!!"
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Di quale famiglia parli?!! Quand'è che hai cominciato a chiamare famiglia quegli avvoltoi che aspettano che io stramazzi al suolo?! Tu chiami famiglia quei putridi vermi brulicanti?!!"
Turkish (TR): "Sen kime aile diyorsun!! Benim yığılıp ölmemi bekleyen o akbabalara ne zamandan beri aile demeye başladın?! Ne zamandan beri çürüyen, pis kokulu kurtçuklara AİLE demeye başladın?!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Oh cielo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Che mi tocca sentire."

Steam (ST): Krauss shrugged at this answer, which he had half expected.
Umineko Project (UP): Krauss shrugged at this answer which he had half‐expected.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Krauss shrugged at this answer, which he had half expected.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Krauss deu de ombros à resposta a qual ele já esperava.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "Genji, carry the meal here as you were told!! Why don't you listen to what I say?!! Why?! WHY?!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Genji, carry the meal here as you were told!! Why don't you listen to what I say?!! Why?! WHY?!!"

PC Japanese (JP): ……兄弟たちの手前、どうせ無駄だと知りつつ声を掛けにきただけだ。

Speaker: Ronoue Genji
Steam (ST): "...Master, we have finished preparations for your meal to be carried here. ......Shall we bring some for Doctor Nanjo as well?"
Umineko Project (UP): "...My lord. We have finished preparations for the meal to be carried here. .........What about the serving for Doctor Nanjo?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...Master. We have finished preparations for the meal to be carried here. .........What about a serving for Doctor Nanjo?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…お館様。お食事を運ぶ準備はできております。………南條先生の分はいかがしますか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…お館様。お食事を運ぶ準備はできております。………南條先生の分はいかがいたしますか」
Russian (RU): "...Господин. Мы закончили подготовку к трапезе. Еда будет доставлена сюда. .........Что делать с обслуживанием доктора Нанджо?"

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Padrone. I preparativi per portare il suo pasto sono terminati... C'è bisogno di una porzione per il dottor Nanjo?"
Turkish (TR): "...Lordum. Yemeğin buraya taşınması için hazırlıklarımızı tamamladık. .........Doktor Nanjo'nun servisini ne yapalım?"

Steam (ST): Nanjo could be seen in the study. Because Kinzo had forcefully pestered him into finishing their long-lasting chess game, they had been playing against each other since the early evening.
Umineko Project (UP): Nanjo was also in the study. Because Kinzo had strongly pestered him about resolving their long‐lasting chess game, Nanjo had been Kinzo's opponent since before evening.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Nanjo's figure was in the study. Because Kinzo had strongly pestered him about resolving their long lasting chess game, Nanjo had been Kinzo's opponent since before evening.
PC Japanese (JP): 南條の姿は、書斎の中にあった。長く続けられてきた二人のチェスの決着を、金蔵が強くせがんだため、夕方前からずっと相手をさせられていたのだ。
Russian (RU): Нанджо всё ещё находился в кабинете. Поскольку Кинзо решительно настаивал на завершении их партии в шахматы, Нанджо ещё до наступления вечера был оппонентом Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nanjo também estava no estúdio. Porque Kinzo havia o infernizado fortemente para resolver seu duradouro jogo de xadrez, que eles vinham jogando desde antes de enoitecer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 南條身在書房之中。由於金藏硬是纏著南條，讓他與自己把這盤下了時日良久的國際象棋分出勝負，因此他從黃昏前開始就一直在陪著金藏下棋。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 南条身在书房之中。由于金藏硬是缠着南条，让他与自己把这盘下了时日良久的国际象棋分出胜负，因此他从黄昏前开始就一直在陪着金藏下棋。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La figura di Nanjo era nello studio. Siccome Kinzo aveva fortemente insistito perché finissero la loro partita a scacchi che ormai andava avanti da molto tempo, Nanjo aveva giocato contro Kinzo da prima di cena.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Nanjo si trovava nello studio. Siccome Kinzo lo aveva assillato molto, affinché finissero la loro partita a scacchi che andava avanti da molto tempo, Nanjo aveva giocato contro di lui da prima di sera.
Turkish (TR): Nanjo da çalışma odasındaydı. Kinzo uzun süredir devam eden satranç oyununu bitirmeleri için onu çok sıkıştırdığından, Nanjo önceki akşamdan beri Kinzo'nun rakibiydi.

Steam (ST): Nanjo had announced as a doctor that Kinzo's days were numbered. ...So, he couldn't refuse if Kinzo demanded that they finish this game while he still lived.
Umineko Project (UP): Nanjo had announced as a doctor that Kinzo's days were numbered.{n}...In that situation, if Kinzo pestered him about finishing a chess game while he was still alive, Nanjo couldn't refuse.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Nanjo had announced as a doctor that Kinzo's days were numbered....In that situation, if Kinzo pestered him about finishing a chess game while he was still alive, Nanjo couldn't refuse.
PC Japanese (JP): 南條は医者として、金蔵に余命がないことを宣告している。…その立場上、命がある内にチェスを決着したいとせがまれれば、断れなかった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 南條は医者として、金蔵に余命がないことを宣告している。{n}…その立場上、命がある内にチェスを決着したいとせがまれれば、断れなかった。
Russian (RU): Нанджо как врач объявил, что Кинзо остались считанные дни.{n}...Поэтому Кинзо всё донимал его просьбой доиграть шахматную партию, пока он ещё жив, и Нанджо просто не мог отказать ему.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Nanjo havia anunciado como médico que os dias de Kinzo estavam contados.{n}...Naquela situação, se Kinzo o infernizava sobre finalizar um jogo de xadrez enquanto ele ainda estava vivo, Nanjo não podia recusar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 作為醫生，南條已經告知了金藏，他已來日無多。{n}…站在這個立場上，若是被金藏纏著說，想在還活著的時候將這盤棋分出個勝負，那是沒法拒絕的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 作为医生，南条已经告知了金藏，他已来日无多。{n}…站在这个立场上，若是被金藏缠着说，想在还活着的时候将这盘棋分出个胜负，那是没法拒绝的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quanto medico, Nanjo aveva annunciato che i giorni di Kinzo erano contati. ... In quella situazione, se Kinzo insisteva per finire una partita mentre era ancora in vita, Nanjo non poteva di certo rifiutare.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In quanto medico, Nanjo aveva annunciato a Kinzo che i suoi giorni erano contati... In una situazione del genere, se Kinzo insisteva per finire la partita mentre era ancora in vita, lui non poteva rifiutare.
Turkish (TR): Nanjo bir doktor olarak Kinzo'nun günlerinin sayılı olduğunu belirtmişti.{n}...Bu koşullar altında, Kinzo hâlâ hayattayken satranç oyununu bitirmesi için onu sıkıştırırsa, Nanjo bunu reddedemezdi.

Steam (ST): Kinzo was thinking deeply about his move, concentrating more than usual. ...It had been Kinzo's turn for quite some time, and Nanjo, who was tired of waiting, had randomly pulled out a book on magic that he couldn't understand and was skimming it.
Umineko Project (UP): Kinzo was thinking deeply about his move, concentrating more than usual. ......It had been Kinzo's turn for quite some time, and Nanjo, who was tired of waiting, had started randomly pulling out grimoires that he couldn't understand and skimming through them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Kinzo was thinking deeply about his move, concentrating more than usual.......It had been Kinzo's turn for quite some time, and Nanjo, who was tired of waiting, had randomly pulled out a book on magic that he couldn't understand and was skimming it.
PC Japanese (JP): 金蔵は普段以上の集中力で一手を熟考する。……先ほどからずっと金蔵の手番で、待ちくたびれた南條は、読んでもわからぬ魔術書を適当に抜き出しては斜め読みしているのだった。
Russian (RU): Кинзо глубоко задумался над своим ходом, сконцентрировавшись гораздо сильнее обычного. ......Раздумья Кинзо над своим ходом затянулись и Нанджо, устав от ожидания, стал наугад вытаскивать непонятные ему магические книги и бегло проглядывать их.

Il turno di Kinzo stava andando avanti da un bel po', e Nanjo, stanco di aspettare, prese un libro a caso di magia nera, materia a lui totalmente ignota, sfogliandolo distrattamente.

Steam (ST): "......I am also hungry. Shall we suspend the game here? Besides, I've used my head so much without a break that I'm already feeling dizzy. ...At this rate, I might not be able to perform at my best."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Steam (ST): "...Now that won't do. .........In chess, both players must always make their best moves. ...Any other sort of move is merely a nuisance to consider, ruining a game whose focus is predicting your opponent's thoughts. ...Such a thing considerably reduces our enjoyment."
Umineko Project (UP): "...That is a problem. ............In chess, both players must always make their best moves. ...Other moves are painful to understand, and ruin a game that is about reading thoughts. ...That considerably reduces our enjoyment."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「…それは困る。…………チェスは、互いに常に最善手を指さねばならぬ。…そうでない一手は理解に苦しみ、思考を読むゲームを狂わせてしまう。…それでは興を著しく削ぐというものだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…それは困る。…………チェスは、互いに常に最善手を指さねばならぬ。…そうでない一手は理解に苦しみ、思考を読むゲームをくるわせてしまう。…それでは興を著しく削ぐというものだ」
Russian (RU): "...Да, это проблема. ............В шахматах оба игрока должны делать лучшие возможные ходы. ...Другие ходы трудно понять, что портит игру, смысл которой заключается в чтении мыслей. ...Это значительно лишает нас удовольствия от игры."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Isso é um problema. ............Em xadrez, ambos os jogadores devem sempre fazer seus melhores movimentos. ...Qualquer outro movimento é dolorosos de se entender, arruinando um jogo onde o foco é ler os pensamentos de seu oponente. ...Tal coisa reduz consideravelmente nosso divertimento."

Le altre mosse sono dolorose da comprendere, e rovinano un gioco che si basa sulla lettura del pensiero. ... Ciò ridurrebbe notevolmente il nostro divertimento."

Steam (ST): "True, the goal of chess is for both players to make the best possible moves and aim for victory. ...It's an intellectual game where reading your opponent is key."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Certamente.
