Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "...If that's the fate you've decided upon, do as you will. ......I won't be afraid, and I won't stand against you. After all, I don't believe the cruel fate that's coming is something controlled by your will.
Umineko Project (UP): "...If that is the fate that you have decided, that is up to you. ......I won't be afraid of that or go against that. Because I don't believe that the grim fate that will start occurring now is something controlled by your will."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...If that is the fate that you have decided, that is up to you. ......I won't be afraid of that or go against that. Because I don't believe that the severe fate that will start occurring from here on is something controlled by your will.
PC Japanese (JP): 「…それがあなたの決められた運命ならばご随意に。……私はそれに怯えたり、逆らったりしません。これから起こる苛烈な運命が、あなたの意思によるものだなんて、信じないから。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…それがあなたの決められた運命ならばご随意に。……私はそれに怯えたり、逆らったりしません。これから起こる苛烈な運命が、あなたの意思によるものだなんて、信じないから」
Russian (RU): "...Если такова судьба, избранная вами, то это ваше дело. ......Я не стану бояться этого или идти против этого. Потому что не верю, что тяжёлая судьба, что начинается здесь, может быть подчинена вашей воле."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Se esse é o destino que você decidiu, isso cabe a você. ......Não terei medo ou irei contra isso. Porque não acredito que o destino sombrio que começará a se desenrolar agora é algo controlado pela sua vontade."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…如果這就是你定好了的命運，那隨你的便。……我不會去畏懼，也不會去抗拒。因為我不信，接下來發生的殘酷命運，會由你的意志引起。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…如果这就是你定好了的命运，那随你的便。……我不会去畏惧，也不会去抗拒。因为我不信，接下来发生的残酷命运，会由你的意志引起。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Se questo è il destino che ha deciso, la scelta sta a lei. ... Non ne sarò spaventata né lo combatterò. Perché non credo che l'arduo destino che inizierà d'ora in poi sia governato dalla sua volontà.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Se è questo il destino che hai deciso, allora fai pure... Non ne avrò paura, e non mi opporrò ad esso. Perché non credo che il fato crudele in serbo per noi sia governato dalla tua volontà."
Turkish (TR): "...Eğer karar verdiğiniz kader buysa, gerisi size kalmış. ......Bundan korkmayacağım ve buna karşı çıkmayacağım. Çünkü şu anda gerçekleşmeye başlayacak olan acımasız kaderin sizin iradenizle kontrol edilen bir şey olduğuna inanmıyorum."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): We humans know nothing about fates that might come to pass in the future. That's why I'll live to the fullest until the last instant, following my convictions and the fate set before me. Fate is just a roll of the dice. There's no malice in it. Even if you claim there is, I won't believe it."
Umineko Project (UP): "We humans don't know anything about our possible future fates. That is how we live to the fullest, following our own beliefs and destinies until the last. Fate is just a roll of the dice. You can't feel malice in it. Try as you might to inject some, I won't believe you."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): We humans don't know anything about fates that could occur in the future. Therefore, until the last instant, I'll live to the fullest, relying on my own fate and conviction. Fate is just a roll of the dice. You can't feel malice from it. I don't believe that you inspire it."
PC Japanese (JP): 私たち人間は、未来に起こりうる運命など知らない。だからこそ、最後の瞬間まで、自分の信念と運命に従い精一杯生き抜く。運命はただのサイコロの目。そこに悪意なんて感じない。あなたが吹き込もうと、信じない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私たち人間は、未来に起こりうる運命など知らない。だからこそ、最後の瞬間まで、自分の信念と運命に従い精一杯生き抜く。運命はただのサイコロの目。そこに悪意なんて感じない。あなたが吹き込もうと、信じない」
Russian (RU): "Мы, люди, ничего не знаем о судьбе, которая может случиться в будущем. Поэтому я до последнего мгновения буду жить целиком и полностью положившись на свою судьбу и убеждения. Судьба это лишь бросок кубиков для игры в кости. От этой игры не ощущается злоба. Я не верю, что вы вдохновляете судьбу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nós, humanos, não sabemos nada sobre nossos possíveis destinos futuros.{n}É assim que vivemos ao máximo, seguindo nossas próprias crenças e destinos até o final. O destino não é nada mais do que o rolar dos dados. Não há nenhuma malícia nisto. Mesmo que você afirme que sim, eu não acreditarei."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我們人類，不會知道未來將迎來怎樣的命運。正因如此，我們才會直到最後的一瞬間，都順隨著自己的信念與命運，竭盡全力地活下去。命運不過是骰子擲出來的點數。我是不會從這之中感到惡意的。縱使你如何煽動鼓吹，我也不會去相信。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我们人类，不会知道未来将迎来怎样的命运。正因如此，我们才会直到最后的一瞬间，都顺随着自己的信念与命运，竭尽全力地活下去。命运不过是骰子掷出来的点数。我是不会从这之中感到恶意的。纵使你如何煽动鼓吹，我也不会去相信。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Noi umani non sappiamo nulla degli eventi che potrebbero accadere in futuro. Quindi, fino all'ultimo momento, vivrò appieno, appoggiandomi solo sul mio destino e sulle mie convinzioni. Il destino è solo un tiro di dadi. Non lo si può avvertire come malevolo. Non credo che sia lei a governarlo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Noi umani non sappiamo nulla sul destino che potrebbe compiersi nel futuro. Per questo ci godiamo appieno la nostra vita, seguendo le nostre convinzioni e la sorte fino agli ultimi istanti. Il fato è solo il risultato del tiro di un dado. Non è presente alcuna malizia. Anche se proverai a convincermi del contrario, io non ti crederò."
Turkish (TR): "Biz insanlar gelecekteki olası kaderlerimiz hakkında hiçbir şey bilmiyoruz. İşte bu yolla kendi inançlarımızı ve kaderimizi sonuna kadar takip ederek dolu dolu yaşarız. Kader sadece zar atmaktan ibarettir. İçinde kötü niyet yoktur. Ne kadar kötü niyet enjekte etmeye çalışırsanız çalışın, size inanmayacağım."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "...Hoh. So, even though you've quit being furniture, you have no fear of death. ...It seems you believe this will bore me, but you couldn't be more wrong. ...The thought of seeing whether you can hold onto that view until the last moment...merely serves to intrigue me more and more. *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*...!"

Even though you have stopped being furniture, you have no fear of death. ......It seems you think that will bore me, but that's a huge misunderstanding. ...I am now all the more interested to see whether you really can stick to that until your last moments. *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*...!"

Russian (RU): "......Хо. Хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи‐хи!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Hoh. Mesmo que tenha deixado de ser uma mobília, você não tem medo da morte. ......Parece que você acha que vai me entediar, mas esse é um enorme mal‐entendido. ...Eu estou ainda mais interessada agora para ver se você realmente consegue se agarrar a isto até seus últimos momentos. *gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*...!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……嚯。明明都不做家具了，居然還不怕死。……雖然汝似乎是覺得，如此便能讓妾身感到無聊，但這麼想可就大錯特錯了。…妾身真是越來越好奇，汝是不是真的能將這信念貫徹到最後一瞬間了呢。呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵呵…！」

Il mio interesse aumenterà sempre di più mentre osserverò se puoi davvero tener fede a quelle parole fino ai tuoi ultimi istanti. *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*...!"

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "I can't stand this. ......Why did you take the form of a human, appear in front of us, speak with human words, and ridicule us? ...If you hadn't appeared in front of us, if you hadn't predicted the future, ......we would've been able to live life to the fullest until the last moment."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's so frustrating. ......Why did you take the form of a human, appear in front of us, speak with human words, and ridicule us? ...If you hadn't appeared in front of us, if you hadn't predicted the future, ......we would have been able to live life to the fullest until the last moment."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「私は悔しい。……どうしてあなたは人の姿をして、私たちの前に現れ、人の言葉で語り、私たちを嘲笑うのか。…私たちの前に現れず、運命を予告しなかったなら、……私たちは最後の一瞬まで、精一杯生きられるのに。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「私は悔しい。……どうしてあなたは人の姿をして、私たちの前に現れ、人の言葉で語り、私たちを嘲笑うのか。…私たちの前に現れず、運命を予告しなかったなら、……私たちは最後の一瞬まで、精一杯生きられるのに」
Russian (RU): "Как же это обидно. ......Почему вы приняли форму человека, явившись перед нами, говорили человеческими словами и смеялись над нами? ...Не явись вы перед нами, не предскажи будущее, то мы смогли бы жить полной жизнью до самого последнего момента."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É tão frustrante. ......Por que você assumiu a forma humana, apareceu na nossa frente, falou com palavras humanas e nos ridicularizou? ...Se você não tivesse aparecido na nossa frente, se você não tivesse previsto o futuro, ......nós teríamos sido capazes de viver a vida ao máximo até o último momento."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我很不甘心。……為什麼你會化作人的樣子，在我們面前出現，以人的言語說話，還要來嘲笑我們？…若是你沒在我們面前出現，沒事先向我們告知過命運的話，……我們明明就可以竭盡全力地，活到最後的一瞬間了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我很不甘心。……为什么你会化作人的样子，在我们面前出现，以人的言语说话，还要来嘲笑我们？…若是你没在我们面前出现，没事先向我们告知过命运的话，……我们明明就可以竭尽全力地，活到最后的一瞬间了。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sono amareggiata. ... Perché ha preso sembianze umane, è comparsa a noi, ci ha parlato con parole umane, e si è presa gioco di noi? ... Se lei non fosse apparsa davanti a noi, se lei non avesse predetto il futuro... noi saremmo stati in grado di vivere la vita appieno fino all'ultimo momento."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È tutto così frustante... Perché prendere sembianze umane, comparire dinanzi a noi, parlare come un essere umano, e prenderti gioco di noi...? Se tu non fossi apparsa di fronte a noi, se tu non avessi predetto il futuro... avremmo potuto vivere appieno fino all'ultimo istante."
Turkish (TR): "Bu çok anlamsız. ......Neden bir insan şekline büründünüz, önümüzde belirdiniz, ve insansı sözlerle konuşup bizimle alay ettiniz? ...Eğer karşımıza çıkmamış ve geleceği öngörmemiş olsaydınız, ......son anımıza kadar hayatı dolu dolu yaşayabilirdik."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "That's what witches do. I live off your fates, reigning as a high-order being does over low-order beings. Your fates are nothing more than Fragments. If I cup my hands together, I could scoop out as many of those as I want."
Umineko Project (UP): "That's what witches do. We live off your fates, reigning as a high‐order being does over low‐order beings. After all, your fates are merely fragments. If we cup our hands together, we can scoop out as many as we want."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's what witches do. I live off your fates, reigning as a high-order being does over low-order beings. After all, for all of you, fate is just a Fragment. If you make soup with both hands, you can scoop out as much as you want."
PC Japanese (JP): 「それが魔女というものよ。貴様らの運命を食い物に、高次の存在として低次の存在の上に君臨する。そなたらの運命など所詮はカケラ。両手で椀を作ればいくらでも掬える。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「それが魔女というものよ。貴様らの運命を食い物に、高次の存在として低次の存在の上に君臨する。そなたらの運命など所詮はカケラ。両手で椀を作ればいくらでも掬える」
Russian (RU): "Вот как раз этим ведьмы и занимаются. Я живу за счет ваших судеб, царствуя как существо высшего порядка над существами низшего порядка. В конце концов, вся ваша судьба всего лишь {ruby:какера:фрагмент}, осколок. Если ты берешь суп обеими руками, ты можешь вычерпать столько, сколько захочешь."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Isso é o que as bruxas fazem. Vivemos de seus destinos, reinando como um ser de alta‐ordem faz sobre seres de baixa‐ordem. Afinal, seus destinos são meramente Fragmentos. Se juntarmos nossas mãos, podemos colher quantos quisermos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這就是魔女啊。魔女會把你們這幫東西的命運當成食物，以高階之身，君臨在低階之上。汝等的命運不過是區區碎片罷了。只需雙手合起來一撈，要多少就能撈得起多少。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这就是魔女啊。魔女会把你们这帮东西的命运当成食物，以高阶之身，君临在低阶之上。汝等的命运不过是区区碎片罢了。只需双手合起来一捞，要多少就能捞得起多少。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Questo è ciò che fanno le streghe. Vivo dei vostri fati, regnando come un essere superiore fa con creature inferiori. Dopotutto, per tutti voi, il destino è solo un Frammento. Se fai della zuppa con ambo le mani puoi prenderne quanta ne vuoi."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "È questo ciò che fanno le streghe. Ci nutriamo dei vostri fati, e in qualità di esseri superiori, regniamo al di sopra di voi creature inferiori. Dopotutto, i vostri destini sono dei miseri frammenti. Se mettessi le mani a cucchiaio, potrei prenderne quanti ne voglio..."
Turkish (TR): "Bu cadıların yaptığı şey. Kaderlerinizden geçiniyor, üst düzey bir varlığın alt düzey varlıklar üzerinde kurduğu hükümdarlık gibi hüküm sürüyoruz. Ne de olsa, kaderiniz sadece kakeralardan ibaret. Ellerimi birleştirirsem, avucuma istediğim kadarını doldurabilirim."

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Proprio come non importa se le mucche da carne che sto allevando si mettono a blaterare, non cambierà il fatto che le inviterò a tavola per cena. *cackle*cackle*...!"

Steam (ST): And the sound of the door closing came instead of an answer.
Umineko Project (UP): And the sound of the door closing came instead of an answer.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And the sound of the door closing came instead of an answer.
PC Japanese (JP): そして扉が閉じられるその音が、返事の代わりとなるのだった。
Russian (RU): Ответом послужил звук закрываемой двери.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No lugar de sua resposta, ouviu‐se o som da porta se fechando.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而那響起的關門聲，代替了回答。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而那响起的关门声，代替了回答。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E il rumore della porta che si chiudeva giunse al posto di una risposta.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E al posto di una risposta, ci fu il rumore di una porta che si chiuse.
Turkish (TR): Ve cevap yerine kapının kapanma sesi geldi.

Steam (ST): Shannon's resistance probably struck far more deeply into the witch than Shannon herself thought.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that Shannon's resistance had probably struck far more deeply into the witch than Shannon herself had thought.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that Shannon's resistance probably struck far more deeply into the witch than Shannon herself thought.
PC Japanese (JP): その紗音の抵抗は、多分、彼女が思っているよりはるかに深く魔女に刺さったようだった。
Russian (RU): Похоже, что сопротивление Шаннон, судя по всему, задело ведьму гораздо сильнее, чем полагала сама Шаннон.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que a resistência de Shannon provavelmente tinha atingido mais profundamente a bruxa do que Shannon pensou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 紗音的這份抵抗，多半比她想的還要深得多地刺進了魔女的心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 纱音的这份抵抗，多半比她想的还要深得多地刺进了魔女的心。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che la resistenza di Shannon avesse colpito la strega molto più a fondo di quanto Shannon stessa avesse creduto.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A quanto pareva, il tener testa di Shannon aveva colpito la strega molto più a fondo di quanto lei stessa avesse pensato...
Turkish (TR): Görünüşe göre Shannon'un direnişi cadıyı Shannon'un düşündüğünden çok daha derinden vurmuştu.

Steam (ST): ...Because an expression of hatred once again rose to {f:5:Beatrice}'s face.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Because an expression of hatred had once again risen to {f:5:Beatrice}'s face.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Because an expression of hatred once again rose to Beatrice's face.
PC Japanese (JP): …なぜなら、ベアトリーチェは再び憎悪に満ちた形相を浮かべていたから。
Russian (RU): ...Поскольку выражение ненависти снова вернулось на лицо {f:5:Беатриче}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Porque uma expressão mais uma vez havia nascido no rosto de {f:5:Beatrice}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …如此形容，是因為貝阿朵莉切再一次地露出了滿臉憎惡的神情。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …如此形容，是因为贝阿朵莉切再一次地露出了满脸憎恶的神情。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché ancora una volta, un'espressione carica d'odio era apparsa sul viso di Beatrice.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Perché, ancora una volta, sul viso di {f:5:Beatrice} apparve un'espressione carica d'odio.
Turkish (TR): ...Çünkü {f:5:Beatrice}'in yüzünde bir kez daha nefret ifadesi belirmişti.

Steam (ST): She had made Kanon submit, even though he hadn't been ensnared until the end. ...Whereas Shannon, who had been so easily ensnared before, refused to submit this time.
Umineko Project (UP): She had made Kanon submit, even though he hadn't been taken in until the end. ...Yet after that, now it was Shannon who refused to submit, when until now she had been easily taken in.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had made Kanon submit, even though he hadn't been ensnared until the end. ...And after that, Shannon, who had until now been easily ensnared, refused to submit this time.
PC Japanese (JP): 最後まで篭絡されなかった嘉音を屈服させた。…そうしたら、それまで容易に篭絡されていた紗音が、今度は屈服を拒否した。
Russian (RU): Она заставила Канона подчиниться, даже если тот и не сдался окончательно. ...И после этого Шаннон, которая всё это время так легко попадалась, отказалась подчиняться на этот раз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela havia feito Kanon se submeter, mesmo que ele não tivesse sido enredado até o fim. ...E então, após isto, agora era Shannon que se recusava a submeter‐se, mesmo até então ela tendo sido enredada facilmente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 魔女讓直至最後都未能引誘成功的嘉音，成功屈服了。…然而之前很容易就引誘到手了的紗音，這一次卻拒絕了屈服。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 魔女让直至最后都未能引诱成功的嘉音，成功屈服了。…然而之前很容易就引诱到手了的纱音，这一次却拒绝了屈服。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aveva fatto sottomettere Kanon, anche se non si era lasciato intrappolare fino alla fine. ... Dopodiché, Shannon, che fino ad ora si era lasciata manipolare facilmente, questa volta si era rifiutata di sottomettersi.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Aveva piegato Kanon, che non si era lasciato far controllare fino alla fine... E ora, Shannon, che fino a quel momento si era lasciata facilmente manipolare, si era rifiutata di sottomettersi.
Turkish (TR): Tamamen teslim olmamış olsa da, Kanon'un boyun eğmesini sağlamıştı. ...Daha önce kolayca tuzağa düşürülen Shannon ise bu kez boyun eğmeyi reddetti.

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "......I see. ...So, this state of affairs is amusing after all. ...*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle* ...Perhaps I really am still young. This is why I haven't tired of life after one thousand years..."
Umineko Project (UP): "...............Oh? ...This is interesting after all! ......*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*. ...I suppose I'm not so old yet. This is why I'm still not tired of living after one thousand years..."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "............What is this? ...Isn't this interesting after all? ......*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*. ...Am I still far too young? This is why I'm still not tired of living after one thousand years..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………何だ。…やはりこれは面白いことではないか。……くっくくくくくく。…妾もまだまだ若いか。これだから千年は生き飽きぬのよ…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……………何だ。…やはりこれは面白いことではないか。……くっくくくくくく。…妾もまだまだ若いか。これだから千年は生き飽きぬのよ…」
Russian (RU): "............Так‐так. ...Очень интересно. ......*Хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*хи‐хи*. ...Неужели я всё ещё слишком молода? Вот поэтому я так и не устала от жизни спустя тысячу лет..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...............Oh? ...Isto é interessante, afinal! ......*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*gargalhada*. ...Suponho que não estou tão velha ainda. É por isso que ainda não estou cansada de viver, mesmo depois de mil anos..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……………什麼嘛。…這不是挺有趣的嘛。……呵呵呵呵呵呵呵。…妾身還是年輕啊。正因如此，妾身才會活千年都活不膩啊…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……………什么嘛。…这不是挺有趣的嘛。……呵呵呵呵呵呵呵。…妾身还是年轻啊。正因如此，妾身才会活千年都活不腻啊…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Che succede? ... Non è forse interessante dopotutto? ... *cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*. ... Che io sia ancora troppo giovane? È per questo che dopo mille anni non mi sono ancora stancata di vivere..."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...Ma tu guarda... In fondo, tutto ciò potrebbe rivelarsi interessante... Eheheheheheheh... Che io sia ancora troppo giovane? Sarà per questo che, in mille anni, non mi sono mai stancata di vivere..."
Turkish (TR): "...............Bu da ne? ...Her şeye rağmen bu ilginç! ......*cackle*cackle*cackle*cackle*. ...Sanırım henüz o kadar da yaşlanmadım. İşte bu sayede bin yıl sonra bile hâlâ yaşamaktan yorulmadım..."

Steam (ST): This was most fabulous part of the family conference... Dinner.
Umineko Project (UP): The most fabulous time in the family conference.{n}That was the dinner.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The most fabulous time in the family conference... That was the dinner.
PC Japanese (JP): 親族会議でもっとも華やかな時間。それが晩餐だった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 親族会議でもっとも華やかな時間。{n}それが晩餐だった。
Russian (RU): Самым потрясающим отрезком времени семейного собрания {n}было время ужина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O momento mais fabuloso da conferência familiar.{n}Esse era o jantar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 親族會議中最為華美的時間。{n}即是用晚餐的時候。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 亲族会议中最为华美的时间。{n}即是用晚餐的时候。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il momento più straordinario della conferenza di famiglia... era la cena.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Il momento più appariscente della riunione di famiglia... era la cena.
Turkish (TR): Aile konferansındaki en muhteşem zaman gelmişti.{n}Akşam yemeği.

Steam (ST): In the past, when Kinzo had been serious about the conference, he'd taken everyone's yearly gathering for dinner very seriously.
Umineko Project (UP): Back when Kinzo had been serious about the family conference, he had placed extreme importance upon this dinner, for which everyone would gather just once a year.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In the past, Kinzo, who had been serious about the family conference, took everyone's yearly gathering for dinner very seriously.
PC Japanese (JP): かつて親族会議に真剣だった頃の金蔵は、年に一度、全員が揃うこの晩餐を非常に重視していた。
Russian (RU): В прошлом Кинзо, серьёзно относившийся к собранию семьи, был предельно строг на каждом ежегодном сборе во время ужина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Antigamente, quando Kinzo levava a conferência familiar a sério, ele impôs uma extrema importância sobre o jantar, pelo qual todos se reuniriam somente uma vez ao ano.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 曾經認真對待親族會議時的金藏，非常重視這一年一度全員齊聚的晚餐。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 曾经认真对待亲族会议时的金藏，非常重视这一年一度全员齐聚的晚餐。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In passato, Kinzo, che teneva in gran considerazione la conferenza, trattava con molta serietà la riunione annuale in cui tutti si ritrovavano per cena.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): In passato, quando Kinzo teneva in gran considerazione la riunione di famiglia, egli prestava moltissima importanza alla cena annuale, momento in cui tutti i parenti erano riuniti assieme.
Turkish (TR): Kinzo'nun aile konferansı konusunda ciddi olduğu zamanlarda, herkesin yılda sadece bir kez bir araya geldiği bu yemeğe son derece önem verirdi.

Steam (ST): Because anything embarrassing that occurred during the dinner would cause the deepest shame for him as the host, he had given Natsuhi stern orders to avoid embarrassments at all costs.
Umineko Project (UP): Should the dinner not meet standards, he would take it as the deepest shame for himself as the host, and he had strongly ordered Natsuhi to make absolutely sure that it was one to be proud of.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because anything embarrassing that occurred during the dinner would cause the deepest shame for him as the host, he had strongly ordered Natsuhi to sincerely attempt to avoid anything embarrassing.
PC Japanese (JP): この晩餐が見っとも無いようなことがあれば、それはホスト役である自分にとっての最大の恥であるとし、夏妃に対し、くれぐれも恥ずかしい晩餐とならないよう厳命していたという。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): この晩餐がみっともないようなことがあれば、それはホスト役である自分にとっての最大の恥であるとし、夏妃に対し、くれぐれも恥ずかしい晩餐とならないよう厳命していたという。
Russian (RU): Поскольку любой казус, способный произойти во время ужина, для него как для хозяина мог стать огромным позором, он строго‐настрого наказал Нацухи добросовестно пытаться не допустить любых неловкостей и конфузов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se o jantar não alcançasse os mais altos padrões impostos, ele tomaria isso como a mais profunda vergonha para si mesmo como anfitrião, e para isso ordenou severamente Natsuhi para evitar qualquer tipo de vergonha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 據說，這晚餐若是有了什麼不像樣的地方，他就會把這紕漏當成自己身為主人的最大恥辱，嚴命夏妃，萬萬不能讓這晚餐給他丟臉。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 据说，这晚餐若是有了什么不像样的地方，他就会把这纰漏当成自己身为主人的最大耻辱，严命夏妃，万万不能让这晚餐给他丢脸。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Siccome una qualsiasi cosa imbarazzante che si fosse verificata durante la cena avrebbe causato a lui, l'ospite, grande vergogna, aveva fortemente intimato a Natsuhi di evitare che una cosa simile accadesse.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Siccome una cena non affatto all'altezza avrebbe causato a lui, il padrone di casa, enorme imbarazzo, si dice che avesse perentoriamente ordinato a Natsuhi di far sì che i pasti serali fossero serviti senza alcun intoppo.
Turkish (TR): Yemeğin standartlara uygun olmaması halinde, ev sahibi olarak bunu kendisi için büyük bir utanç olarak kabul ederdi, ve Natsuhi'ye gurur duyulması gereken bir yemek olduğundan kesinlikle emin olmasını şiddetle emrederdi.

Steam (ST): Because of that, she and Krauss eventually hired Gohda, who had confidence in his cooking abilities.
Umineko Project (UP): Because of that, she and Krauss had employed Gohda, who had confidence in his cooking abilities.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Because of that, she and Krauss had employed Gohda, who had confidence in his cooking abilities.
PC Japanese (JP): その為、蔵臼夫妻はやがて、料理の腕に自信のある郷田を雇うことになる。
Russian (RU): По этой причине они с Крауссом и наняли Году, уверенного в своих кулинарных способностях.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por causa disso, junto com Krauss, eles empregaram Gohda, que possuía confiança em suas habilidades culinárias.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因此，藏臼夫妻在日後僱用了對廚藝很有自信的鄉田。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此，藏臼夫妻在日后雇用了对厨艺很有自信的乡田。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Per questo motivo, lei e Krauss avevano assunto Gohda, che aveva fiducia nelle proprie abilità culinarie.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per questo motivo, lei e suo marito Klaus avevano assunto Gouda, che aveva fiducia nelle proprie abilità culinarie...
Turkish (TR): Bu nedenle, o ve Krauss, aşçılık yeteneklerine çok güvenen Gohda'yı işe almışlardı.

Steam (ST): ...Thanks to that, they became able serve wonderful dinners they could be confident in, but by that time, Kinzo had closed himself up in his study and never appeared for dinner. Maybe you could call that ironic...
Umineko Project (UP): ......As a result, they could unveil a wonderful dinner they had confidence in, yet by that time, Kinzo had started closing himself up in his study and no longer appeared for dinner—maybe you could call that ironic...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......As a result, even though they could announce a wonderful dinner they had confidence in, by that time, Kinzo had closed himself up in his study and did not appear for dinner. Maybe you could call that ironic...
PC Japanese (JP): ……その結果、自信の持てる素晴らしい晩餐を披露できるようになったにもかかわらず、その頃には金蔵は書斎に引き篭もるようになっていて晩餐に姿を現さなくなったのだから、皮肉と言えたかもしれない…。
Russian (RU): ......В итоге, даже при том, что они могли быть уверены в безупречности приготовленного ужина, Кинзо к тому времени уже заперся у себя в кабинете и не являлся на ужин. Возможно, это можно назвать иронией...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Como um resultado, eles foram capazes de servir maravilhosos jantares com total confiança, ainda que por volta daquela época, Kinzo tenha começado a se fechar em seu estúdio e parado de aparecer para o jantar — talvez você possa até chamar isso de irônico...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……而結果，儘管他們現如今已能將這華麗的晚餐，自信滿滿地呈上桌，可此時的金藏卻早就把自己關在了書房裡，再也沒在晚餐上露過面。所以或許可以說，這也挺諷刺的吧…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……而结果，尽管他们现如今已能将这华丽的晚餐，自信满满地呈上桌，可此时的金藏却早就把自己关在了书房里，再也没在晚餐上露过面。所以或许可以说，这也挺讽刺的吧…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Così, nonostante fossero in grado di presentare una cena meravigliosa di cui potevano andare fieri, in quel periodo Kinzo si era rinchiuso nel suo studio e non si presentò alla cena. Si sarebbe forse potuto dire che c'era dell'ironia in ciò...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E così, divennero in grado di presentare cene meravigliose di cui potevano andare fieri, ma ciononostante, in quel periodo Kinzo si era rinchiuso nel suo studio, e durante le cene non si faceva vedere. Si potrebbe dire che c'era dell'ironia in ciò...
Turkish (TR): ......Böylece, güvendikleri harika bir akşam yemeği ortaya çıkarabileceklerdi, ancak o zamana kadar Kinzo kendini çalışma odasına kapatmaya başlamıştı ve artık akşam yemeğine gelmiyordu—belki buna ironik diyebilirsiniz...

Steam (ST): When the main dish for tonight, calf steak, was set out, Gohda began to describe it proudly, further stimulating everyone's appetites.
Umineko Project (UP): When the main dish for tonight, calf steak, was set out, Gohda began to brag about it, further exciting everyone's appetite.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When the main dish for tonight, calf steak, was set out, Gohda began to brag about it, further exciting everyone's appetite.
PC Japanese (JP): 今夜のメインディッシュである仔牛のステーキが並べられると、郷田は自慢のトークで、さらに食欲を盛り上げてくれた。
Russian (RU): Когда главное блюдо сегодняшнего вечера, телячий стейк, был наконец выложен на стол, Года принялся нахваливать его, раззадоривая тем самым всеобщий аппетит.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando o prato principal da noite, bife de bezerro, foi servido, Gohda começou a se gabar sobre ele, animando, estimulando ainda mais o apetite de todos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 今晚的主菜小牛排剛被擺上來，鄉田便以那引以為豪的介紹，進一步調動起了人們對它的食欲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 今晚的主菜小牛排刚被摆上来，乡田便以那引以为豪的介绍，进一步调动起了人们对它的食欲。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando il piatto principale della serata, la bistecca di vitello, fu servito, Gohda iniziò a decantarlo, accrescendo ulteriormente l'appetito di tutti.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quando vennero servite le bistecche di vitello, portata principale della serata, le lodi di Gouda incrementarono ulteriormente l'appetito dei presenti.
Turkish (TR): Bu gecenin ana yemeği, dana biftek ortaya konduğunda, Gohda bununla övünmeye başladı, ve herkesin iştahını daha da kabarttı.

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "The sauce here is Bordelaise.
Umineko Project (UP): "The sauce here is Bordelaise."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "The sauce here is Bordelaise.
PC Japanese (JP): 「こちら、ソースはボルドレーズとなっております。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「こちら、ソースはボルドレーズとなっております」
Russian (RU): "Этот соус называется бордосским."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O molho aqui é Bordelaise."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這道菜品用的是波爾多醬汁。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这道菜品用的是波尔多酱汁。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Questa è salsa bordolese.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Qui troverete della salsa bordolese."
Turkish (TR): "Bu sos Bordelaise."

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): Of course, the red wine base I used was excellent even among those made in Bordeaux, but in addition, I prepared an original blend of this house, a blend of choice alcohol from around the world to further deepen the taste.
Umineko Project (UP): "Of course, the red wine base I used was excellent even among those made in Bordeaux, but in addition, I prepared an original blend of this house, a blend of choice alcohols from around the world to further deepen the taste."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Of course, the red wine base I used was excellent even among those made in Bordeaux, but in addition, I prepared an original blend of this house, a blend of choice alcohol from around the world to further deepen the taste.
PC Japanese (JP): ベースの赤ワインはもちろんボルドー産の中でも素晴らしいものを使用しておりますが、その他にも、当家オリジナルブレンドとしまして、世界各地数種類の銘酒をブレンドしまして、より深い味わいとなりますよう、整えてございます。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「ベースの赤ワインはもちろんボルドー産の中でも素晴らしいものを使用しておりますが、その他にも、当家オリジナルブレンドとしまして、世界各地数種類の銘酒をブレンドしまして、より深い味わいとなりますよう、整えてございます」
Russian (RU): "Разумеется, использованное в основе красное вино выделялось великолепием даже среди изготовленных в Бордо вин, но в дополнение я приготовил оригинальную смесь этого дома, смесь из избранных даров Вакха со всего мира для придачи вкусу большей глубины."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É claro, o vinho tinto que usei era excelente mesmo entre aqueles feitos em Bordeaux, mas em adição, preparei uma mistura original da casa, uma mistura de álcoois selecionados do mundo todo para aprofundar ainda mais o sabor."

PC Japanese (JP): 「…とってもおいしいソースね。郷田さんは本当に素晴らしいわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…とってもおいしいソースね。郷田さんは本当に素晴らしいわ」
Russian (RU): "...Какой вкусный соус. Года‐сан, вы просто великолепны."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...É um molho muito delicioso. Gohda‐san, você certamente é maravilhoso."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…這醬汁好美味啊。鄉田真是了不起。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…这酱汁好美味啊。乡田真是了不起。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... È una salsa molto deliziosa. Gohda-san, lei ha davvero talento."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...È una salsa molto deliziosa. Gouda-san, hai davvero talento."
Turkish (TR): "...Çok lezzetli bir sos. Gohda-san, kesinlikle harikasın."

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro
Steam (ST): "It is a great honor to receive your praise. And this is all thanks to Madam's habitual guidance."
Umineko Project (UP): "It is a great honor to receive your praise. And this is all thanks to Madam's habitual guidance."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「お褒めに与り、大変光栄です。これも全て、奥様の日ごろのご指導のお陰でございます。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「お褒めに与り、大変光栄です。これも全て、奥様の日ごろのご指導のお陰でございます」
Russian (RU): "Это большая честь, слышать вашу похвалу. И всё это благодаря постоянному надзору мадам."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "É uma grande honra receber seu elogio. E isto é tudo graças à orientação habitual da madame."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「受各位美譽，鄙人深感光榮。這一切全都多虧了太太平日的教導。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「受各位美誉，鄙人深感光荣。这一切全都多亏了太太平日的教导。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "È un grande onore ricevere i suoi complimenti. E tutto ciò è grazie alla solita supervisione di Madame."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ricevere i suoi complimenti è un grande onore. Tutto questo è stato reso possibile grazie alla supervisione costante della madame."
Turkish (TR): "Övgülerinizi almak büyük bir onur. Ve bunların hepsi Madam'ın her zamanki rehberliği sayesinde."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...No, it was all Gohda's idea. I only listened to the recipe and approved of it."
Umineko Project (UP): "......No, it was all Gohda's idea. I only listened to the recipe and approved of it."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「……いえ、全て郷田のアイデアです。私はレシピを聞き、承認しただけです。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……いえ、全て郷田のアイデアです。私はレシピを聞き、承認しただけです」
Russian (RU): "......Нет, то была исключительно идея Годы. Я только выслушала рецепт и одобрила его."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Não, foi tudo ideia de Gohda. Eu apenas escutei a receita e a aprovei."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……不，全都是鄉田的主意。我只是聽了他說的食譜，做出了認可而已。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……不，全都是乡田的主意。我只是听了他说的食谱，做出了认可而已。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... No, l'idea è stata di Gohda. Ho solo ascoltato e approvato la ricetta."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...No, l'idea è stata tutta di Gouda. Ho solo ascoltato la ricetta e dato la mia approvazione."
Turkish (TR): "......Hayır, hepsi Gohda'nın fikriydi. Ben sadece tarifi dinledim ve onayladım."

Steam (ST): It looked like the siblings quickly got into a loud argument about the sauce, ...but for the most part, dinner proceeded peacefully.
Umineko Project (UP): It looked like the siblings quickly got into a loud argument about something as trivial as the sauce, ...but for the most part, dinner proceeded peacefully.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It looked like the siblings quickly got into a loud argument about the sauce, ...but for the most part, dinner proceeded peacefully.
PC Japanese (JP): たかだかソースの話で、さっそく兄弟たちは鍔迫り合いをしているようだったが、…基本的に晩餐は和やかに進んだ。
Russian (RU): На первый взгляд братья и сёстры затеяли громкий спор о соусе, но в основном ужин проходил довольно спокойно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que os irmãos rapidamente entraram em uma barulhenta discussão sobre algo tão trivial quanto o molho, ...mas pela maior parte, o jantar procedeu pacificamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然僅僅是談談醬汁，兄妹們幾個就好像已經在針鋒相對了似的，…但晚餐基本上還是在一團和氣中進行著。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然仅仅是谈谈酱汁，兄妹们几个就好像已经在针锋相对了似的，…但晚餐基本上还是在一团和气中进行着。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che i fratelli avessero presto iniziato una forte discussione sulla salsa... ma tutto sommato, la cena procedette in tranquillità.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Apparentemente, i fratelli avevano rapidamente dato inizio ad una tanto accesa quanto frivola discussione sulla salsa... ma nel complesso, la cena stava procedendo tranquillamente.
Turkish (TR): Görünüşe göre kardeşler sos gibi önemsiz bir şey hakkında hızlıca gürültülü bir tartışmaya girmişlerdi, ...ancak bunu saymazsak, akşam yemeği barışçıl bir şekilde ilerledi.

Steam (ST): ...However, a certain question they desperately wanted to ask burned inside each one of them.
Umineko Project (UP): ......However, the thing that they all really wanted to ask about smoldered inside each of their hearts.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......However, something that they really wanted to ask about smoldered inside all of their hearts.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、全員の胸中の中には、どうしても聞きたいことが燻り続けていた。
Russian (RU): ......Однако то, о чём им действительно хотелось спросить, тлело в их сердцах.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Entretanto, aquilo que todos eles realmente queriam saber ardia dentro do coração de cada um deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過，所有人的心中，都在為一件想問得不得了的事憋得心焦。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过，所有人的心中，都在为一件想问得不得了的事憋得心焦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Tuttavia, in tutti i loro cuori bruciava qualcosa di cui desideravano chiedere.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, dentro di loro, tutti fremevano immensamente per quello che volevano chiedere...
Turkish (TR): ......Fakat, hepsinin asıl öğrenmek istediği şey her birinin yüreğini yakıyordu.

Steam (ST): ...It was about that visitor, the 19th person. .........The Golden Witch.
Umineko Project (UP): ......And that was the visitor, the 19th person.{n}............The Golden Witch.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......And that was the visitor, the 19th person.............The Golden Witch.
PC Japanese (JP): ……それは、１９人目の来訪者のこと。…………黄金の魔女のことである。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……それは、１９人目の来訪者のこと。{n}…………黄金の魔女のことである。
Russian (RU): ......И был это вопрос о посетителе — 19‐м человеке.{n}............Золотая Ведьма.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Era sobre a visitante, a 19ª pessoa.{n}............A Bruxa Dourada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……而此事，就是那身為第十九人的來訪者。{n}…………黃金魔女的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……而此事，就是那身为第十九人的来访者。{n}…………黄金魔女的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... E questa era l'ospite, la diciannovesima persona. ... La Strega Dorata.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): L'argomento era la 19ª persona, la visitatrice...{n}Vale a dire, la Strega Dorata.
Turkish (TR): ......Ve bu ziyaretçiydi, 19. kişi.{n}............Altın Cadı.

Steam (ST): In actuality, Eva and Rudolf and the rest were very much on their guards during this meal.
Umineko Project (UP): In actuality, Eva, Rudolf, and Kyrie were on alert during dinner.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): In actuality, Eva and Rudolf and the rest were cautious during dinner.
PC Japanese (JP): 実際のところ、絵羽と留弗夫たちはこの晩餐を警戒していた。
Russian (RU): На самом деле Ева, Рудольф и остальные были настороже во время ужина.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na verdade, Eva, Rudolf e Kyrie estiveram em alerta durante o jantar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 實際上，繪羽和留弗夫他們都對這場晚餐抱著戒心。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 实际上，绘羽和留弗夫他们都对这场晚餐抱着戒心。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In realtà, Eva, Rudolf e gli altri furono prudenti durante la cena.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): A onor del vero, durante la cena, Eva, Rudolf, e gli altri rimasero prudenti.
Turkish (TR): Aslında Eva, Rudolf ve Kyrie yemek boyunca tetikteydi.

Steam (ST): If the mystery guest was ever going to be introduced, this dinner table would be the most appropriate place to do it. ...However, no place was set at the dinner table for the witch.
Umineko Project (UP): If the mystery guest was to be introduced, this dinner table was the most appropriate place to do it. ...However, no plates had been prepared at the table for the witch.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If the mystery guest was to be introduced, this dinner table was the most appropriate place to do it....However, no place was prepared at the dinner table for the witch.
PC Japanese (JP): 謎の来客を紹介するなら、この晩餐の席がもっとも適当だったからである。…しかし、食卓に魔女の分の皿は用意されなかった。
Russian (RU): Если загадочная гостья должна будет предстать перед ними, то представить её за этим обеденным столом будет самым разумным ходом. ...Однако за столом не было специально подготовленного для ведьмы места.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se a hóspede misteriosa fosse ser introduzida, esta mesa de jantar era o local mais apropriado para fazê‐lo. ...Porém, nenhum prato havia sido preparado na mesa para a bruxa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因為若是要介紹神秘來客的話，在這晚餐的席上，是最為合適的時機了。…然而，餐桌上卻沒有準備魔女的餐具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因为若是要介绍神秘来客的话，在这晚餐的席上，是最为合适的时机了。…然而，餐桌上却没有准备魔女的餐具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se c'era bisogno di presentare l'ospite misterioso, questa cena sarebbe stato il posto più adatto per farlo. ... Tuttavia, a tavola non era stato preparato il posto per la strega.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Quella cena era il momento ideale per presentare l'ospite misteriosa... Tuttavia, il piatto per la strega non era stato allestito sul tavolo.
Turkish (TR): Eğer gizemli konuk tanıtılacak olsaydı, bunu yapmak için en uygun yer bu yemek masası olurdu. ...Ancak, masada cadı için herhangi bir tabak hazırlanmamıştı.

Steam (ST): The family conference would begin in earnest after the meal, and previous experiences told them that it might last until deep into the night.
Umineko Project (UP): The family conference would begin in earnest after the meal, and previous experiences told them that it could last until deep into the night.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The family conference would begin in earnest after the meal, and previous experiences told them that it could last until deep into the night.
PC Japanese (JP): 親族会議は食後に本格的に行なわれ、深夜まで続くのが過去の例だ。
Russian (RU): Собрание семьи должно было начаться сразу после трапезы, и предыдущий опыт подсказывал им, что оно может затянуться до глубокой ночи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A conferência familiar começaria a ficar séria após a refeição, e experiências anteriores diziam a eles que ela poderia adentrar à noite.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 依過去的先例，親族會議會在飯後正式召開，一直持續到深夜。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 依过去的先例，亲族会议会在饭后正式召开，一直持续到深夜。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La conferenza sarebbe davvero iniziata dopo il pasto, e le esperienze precedenti dicevano loro che sarebbe potuta durare fino a notte fonda.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Dopo mangiato, la riunione di famiglia sarebbe partita sul serio, e come testimoniavano le esperienze precedenti, sarebbe durata fino a notte fonda...
Turkish (TR): Aile konferansı yemekten sonra ciddiyetle başlayacaktı ve önceki deneyimlerine göre bu konferans gecenin derinliklerine kadar sürebilirdi.

Steam (ST): ...However, they couldn't imagine why such a person should be kept hidden until that late, if they were going to be introduced in the end anyway.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But they couldn't understand what meaning there could be in keeping this person, who should be introduced, hidden until late at night.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......But they couldn't understand what it would mean if this person, who should be introduced, still hadn't been by late that night.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、紹介すべき人物を、深夜まで隠しておく意味があるのかどうか、理解はできなかった。
Russian (RU): ......Но они никак не могли понять, что это может значить, если та особа, которая должна объявиться, так и не появится до конца ночи.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas eles não conseguiam entender qual significado poderia haver em manter esta pessoa, que devia ser introduzida, escondida até tarde da noite.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……但他們實在是想不出，把該介紹的人物藏到深夜是有什麼意義。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……但他们实在是想不出，把该介绍的人物藏到深夜是有什么意义。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Ma non riuscivano a capire cosa avrebbe significato se questa persona, che doveva essere presentata, non si fosse mostrata nemmeno più tardi quella notte.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Tuttavia, loro non riuscivano a comprendere una cosa: perché tenere nascosta fino a tarda sera una persona che doveva essere introdotta agli altri?
Turkish (TR): ......Ama tanıtılması gereken bu kişinin, gece geç saatlere kadar saklanmasının ne anlamı olabileceğini anlayamadılar.

Steam (ST): So, Eva and Rudolf and the rest were starting to feel a certain suspicion.
Umineko Project (UP): So Eva, Rudolf, and Kyrie had started to suspect something.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So Eva and Rudolf and the rest began to feel some doubts.
PC Japanese (JP): だから絵羽と留弗夫たちは、ある疑問を感じるようになっていた。
Russian (RU): Поэтому Ева, Рудольф и все остальные начали испытывать смутные сомнения.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, Eva, Rudolf e Kyrie começaram a suspeitar sobre algo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 因此，繪羽和留弗夫他們，便對此產生了一個疑問。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 因此，绘羽和留弗夫他们，便对此产生了一个疑问。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Così Eva, Rudolf e gli altri iniziarono a nutrire qualche dubbio.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Così, Eva, Rudolf, e gli altri iniziarono a nutrire dei dubbi...
Turkish (TR): Bu yüzden Eva, Rudolf, ve Kyrie bir şeylerden şüphelenmeye başlamışlardı.

Steam (ST): ...Perhaps this guest was unknown even to Krauss.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That the guest might actually be unknown to Krauss as well.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......About whether this guest was actually unknown to Krauss as well.
PC Japanese (JP): ……つまり、あの来客は、実は蔵臼にとっても未知の来客なのではないか、ということだ。
Russian (RU): Они задались вопросом, была ли эта гостья неизвестна в том числе и Крауссу?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Sobre a hóspede também ser desconhecida para Krauss.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……那就是：那位來客，是否實際上對藏臼來說也是位未知的客人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……那就是：那位来客，是否实际上对藏臼来说也是位未知的客人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Riguardo al fatto che quest'ospite fosse in verità sconosciuta anche a Krauss.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Ovvero, che in realtà, quest'ospite sconosciuta, era tale anche per Klaus.
Turkish (TR): ......Konuğun aslında Krauss tarafından da tanınmıyor olabileceğinden.

Steam (ST): If this wasn't an assassin called by Krauss to give him an advantage in the inheritance problem, ...then maybe they should speak frankly to Krauss beforehand, creating a common front to resist anything disadvantageous to the four siblings.
Umineko Project (UP): If she wasn't a saboteur called by Krauss to give him an advantage in the inheritance problem, ...they should probably speak frankly to Krauss beforehand, and create a common front to resist anything disadvantageous to the four siblings.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If this wasn't an assassin called by Krauss to give him an advantage in the inheritance problem, ...maybe they should speak frankly to Krauss beforehand, and create a common front to resist anything disadvantageous to the four siblings.
PC Japanese (JP): 蔵臼が遺産問題を有利に進めるために呼んだ刺客でないとするならば、…蔵臼にも腹を割り、４兄弟で何らかの不利益に対抗する共同戦線を予め話し合っておくべきだろう。
Russian (RU): Если это не был "убийца", нанятый Крауссом для получения преимущества в вопросе наследования... То может им лучше следует заранее откровенно поговорить с Крауссом и сформировать единый фронт для противостояния всему тому, что будет невыгодно кровным братьям и сёстрам.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se ela não era uma assassina chamada por Krauss para dar a ele uma vantagem no problema da herança, ...eles provavelmente deviam falar francamente com Krauss de antemão, e criar uma frente comum para resistir a qualquer coisa desvantajosa aos quatro irmãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果這位來客，不是藏臼為了使自己在遺產問題上取得優勢而叫來的攪局之人，…那麼他們就該對藏臼也開誠布公，兄妹四人一同為組成共同戰線、對抗不利情況，而事先好好商量一番。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果这位来客，不是藏臼为了使自己在遗产问题上取得优势而叫来的搅局之人，…那么他们就该对藏臼也开诚布公，兄妹四人一同为组成共同战线、对抗不利情况，而事先好好商量一番。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se non si trattava di un'assassina chiamata da Krauss per garantirgli un vantaggio nella questione dell'eredità... forse avrebbero dovuto parlare apertamente con Krauss al più presto, e creare un fronte comune per resistere ad un qualsiasi ostacolo per i quattro fratelli.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Se non si trattava di una sabotatrice chiamata da Klaus per garantirgli un vantaggio nella questione ereditaria... forse avrebbero dovuto parlarne al più presto con lui in maniera franca, e formare quanto prima un fronte comune per fronteggiare qualsiasi loro ostacolo...
Turkish (TR): Eğer Krauss'un miras sorununda kendisine avantaj sağlamak için çağırdığı bir sabotajcı değilse, ...muhtemelen Krauss'la önceden açık açık konuşmalı ve dört kardeşin aleyhine olacak her şeye karşı ortak bir cephe oluşturmalıydılar.

Steam (ST): ...If she was Kinzo's assassin, whose purpose was to keep the inheritance from being handed over to the four siblings, the enmity between Krauss and the other siblings could only become a weak point that benefitted the enemy...
Umineko Project (UP): ......If she was Kinzo's saboteur, whose purpose was to keep the inheritance from being handed over to the four siblings, the enmity between Krauss and the other siblings could become nothing more than a weak point that benefitted the enemy...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......If she was Kinzo's assassin, whose purpose was to keep the inheritance from being handed over to the four siblings, the enmity between Krauss and the other siblings could only become a weak point that benefitted the enemy...
PC Japanese (JP): ……もし彼女が金蔵の刺客で、４兄弟に遺産を渡さないことを目的としたならば、蔵臼と兄弟たちとの反目は敵に利用されるだけの弱点となりかねないからだ…。
Russian (RU): ......Если же она была "убийцей", нанятым Кинзо, чья цель заключалась в отбирании наследства у братьев и сестёр, то вражда между Крауссом и остальными могла бы стать их слабым местом, которое бы только пошло на пользу врагу...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Se ela fosse uma assassina chamada por Kinzo, cujo propósito era evitar que a herança fosse entregue aos quatro irmãos, a inimizade entre Krauss e os outros irmãos podia se tornar nada mais do que um ponto fraco que beneficiava o inimigo...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……因為，如果她是金藏派來的攪局者，而她的目的，是不把遺產交給四兄妹的話，那麼藏臼與弟弟妹妹們之間的敵對，就很有可能只會成為被敵人所利用到的弱點…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……因为，如果她是金藏派来的搅局者，而她的目的，是不把遗产交给四兄妹的话，那么藏臼与弟弟妹妹们之间的敌对，就很有可能只会成为被敌人所利用到的弱点…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Se fosse stata un'assassina assoldata da Kinzo il cui scopo era di evitare che l'eredità fosse consegnata ai quattro fratelli, l'inimicizia tra Krauss e gli altri sarebbe solo diventata un punto debole che avrebbe avvantaggiato il nemico...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Nel caso fosse stata una sabotatrice assoldata da Kinzo, il cui scopo era di evitare che l'eredità venisse consegnata ai suoi quattro figli, l'ostilità fra Klaus e gli altri fratelli sarebbe stata un punto debole che avrebbe favorito soltanto il nemico...
Turkish (TR): ......Eğer Kinzo'nun sabotajcısıysa, ve amacı mirasın dört kardeşe verilmesini engellemekse, Krauss ve diğer kardeşler arasındaki düşmanlık, düşmana fayda sağlayan zayıf bir noktadan başka bir şey olmayabilirdi...

Speaker: Gohda Toshiro

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kyrie
Steam (ST): "Umm, please excuse me. ...I was under the impression we had company today, ...but can we expect to be joined at the dinner table?"

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Uhm, mi scusi... Avevo l'impressione che oggi sarebbe venuto un ospite, ma... per caso ci raggiungerà per cena?"

Steam (ST): She had planned on saying it nonchalantly, but unfortunately, it reached the ears of Natsuhi, who was sitting in the next seat over.
Umineko Project (UP): She had thought she'd said it nonchalantly, but unfortunately, it reached the ears of Natsuhi, who was sitting in the next seat.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She had planned on saying it nonchalantly, but unfortunately, it reached the ears of Natsuhi, who was sitting in the next seat.
PC Japanese (JP): さりげない口調で言ったつもりだったが、隣の席の夏妃の耳には入ってしまう。
Russian (RU): Она хотела произнести эти слова равнодушно, но, к сожалению, они достигли ушей Нацухи, сидящей на соседнем месте.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela pensou ter dito isso indiferentemente, mas infelizmente, isso alcançou os ouvidos de Natsuhi, que estava sentada no assento ao lado.

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Kirie intendeva dirlo con nonchalance, ma sfortunatamente, la sua voce raggiunse le orecchie di Natsuhi, seduta accanto a lei.

Steam (ST): It seemed that Natsuhi had heard it as "Even though the guests are here, why hasn't the host come to dinner?" ...In other words, that Kyrie had asked whether Kinzo was going to join them for dinner.
Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that Natsuhi had heard it to mean "even though there are guests here today, won't the host be coming to dinner?" ......In other words, that Kyrie had asked whether Kinzo was going to come to dinner.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that Natsuhi had heard it as, 'Even though the guests have come, won't the host come to dinner?' ......In other words, that Kyrie had asked whether Kinzo was going to come to dinner.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃はそれを、「客が来ているのに、ホストは晩餐に来ないのか」と、……つまり、金蔵は晩餐には来ないのかと問い質したように聞こえたらしい。
Russian (RU): Похоже, что Нацухи истолковала их как "Даже несмотря на то, что прибыл гость, глава всё равно не появится на ужине?" ......Другими словами, что Кирие спросила, придет ли Кинзо на ужин.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que Natsuhi havia escutado aquilo com o significado de "mesmo que haja convidados aqui hoje, o hóspede não virá ao jantar?" ......Em outras palavras, Kyrie havia perguntado se Kinzo estaria vindo ao jantar.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃似乎把这听成了「明明有客人来，宴席之主却不在晚餐上露面吗」的意思，……也就是说，听成了是在质问金藏来不来出席晚餐。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Natsuhi però doveva aver interpretato tutto ciò come, ‘Nonostante gli invitati siano qui, l'ospite non si presenterà a cena?’ ... In altre parole, aveva capito che Kyrie aveva chiesto se Kinzo sarebbe venuto a cena.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Natsuhi doveva aver capito qualcosa come: ‘Gli invitati sono tutti qui, e il padrone di casa invece non si presenta a cena?’... In altre parole, che Kirie avesse chiesto se Kinzo sarebbe venuto a cenare.
Turkish (TR): Natsuhi'nin bunu "bugün burada misafirler olsa da ev sahibi yemeğe gelmeyecek mi?" anlamında duyduğu anlaşılıyordu. ......Başka bir deyişle, Kyrie Kinzo'nun yemeğe gelip gelmeyeceğini sormuştu.

Steam (ST): Battler, who had been sitting next to Natsuhi, seemed to have heard Kyrie's words without misunderstanding them. Thinking it strange that someone else would be invited to today's Family Conference, he spoke up incredulously.

PC Japanese (JP): さらに夏妃の隣に座る戦人は、霧江の言った意味を誤解なく受け取ったらしく、今日の親族会議に、さらに誰が招かれているのかと疑問に思い、頓狂な声をあげた。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que Battler, que estava sentado ao lado de Natsuhi, havia ouvido as palavras de Kyrie sem entendê‐las errado, e com um tom de voz incrédulo, ele questionou quem mais poderia ter sido convidado à conferência familiar de hoje.

Original Witch Hunt (OG): Just by saying that no one has ever met a devil, you can't deny the possibility that they're hiding away somewhere that humans cannot go.

Russian (RU): Просто заявляя, что никто не встретил дьявола, вы не можете отрицать вероятность того, что он может скрываться там, где люди обычно не ходят.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Só porque ninguém nunca conheceu um demônio, não significa que você possa negar a possibilidade que eles estão se escondendo em algum lugar em que humanos não podem ir.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 光憑誰都沒有見過惡魔這一點，是無法否定惡魔在人類無法進入的某處，躲藏著的可能性的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 光凭谁都没有见过恶魔这一点，是无法否定恶魔在人类无法进入的某处，躲藏着的可能性的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Solo dicendo che nessuno lo ha mai incontrato, non puoi negare la possibilità che si stia nascondendo in qualche posto dove gli umani non possono andare.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Anche se si potrebbe replicare che nessuno ha mai incontrato un diavolo, non si può negare la possibilità che si stiano nascondendo in un luogo irraggiungibile dagli umani...
Turkish (TR): Hiç kimsenin bir şeytanla karşılaşmamış olması, onların insanların gidemeyeceği bir yerde saklanıyor olma olasılığını inkâr edebileceğiniz anlamına gelmez.

Steam (ST): ...You can't deny the existence of aliens for exactly the same reason.
Umineko Project (UP): ......You can't deny the existence of aliens for exactly the same reasons.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……宇宙人の存在を否定できないのもまったく同じ。
Russian (RU): ......По той же причине вы не можете отрицать и существование пришельцев из космоса.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Você não pode negar a existência de alienígenas exatamente pelas mesmas razões.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……無法否定外星人的存在也完全是同樣的道理。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……无法否定外星人的存在也完全是同样的道理。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non si può negare l'esistenza degli alieni per lo stesso motivo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): È la stessa ragione per cui non si può negare l'esistenza degli alieni.
Turkish (TR): ......Aynı sebeplerden ötürü uzaylıların varlığını da inkâr edemezsiniz.

Steam (ST): Until humanity searches the whole of space and can show perfectly that aliens don't exist, you can't be sure that they don't exist.
Umineko Project (UP): Until humanity searches the whole of space and can show perfectly that aliens don't exist, you can't be sure that they don't.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Until humanity searches the whole of space and can show perfectly that aliens don't exist, you can't be sure that they don't exist.
PC Japanese (JP): 人類が全宇宙を探索し尽くして、存在しないことを完全に示さない限り、宇宙人がいないなどと断定することはできないのだ。
Russian (RU): До тех пор, пока люди не обыщут весь космос и не убедятся, что пришельцев не существует, вы не можете быть уверены в их несуществовании.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Até a humanidade buscar por todo o espaço e poder demonstrar com certeza que alienígenas não existem, você não pode ter certeza que não existem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 在人類將宇宙探索窮盡，能完全證明出沒有外星人之前，是無法去斷定它們並不存在的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 在人类将宇宙探索穷尽，能完全证明出没有外星人之前，是无法去断定它们并不存在的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Fino a quando l'umanità non avrà perlustrato l'intero spazio e mostrato chiaramente che gli alieni non esistono, non si può essere sicuri che loro non ci siano.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Fin quando l'umanità non perlustrerà tutto il cosmo, e non renderà completamente evidente la loro inesistenza, non si può concludere che gli alieni non esistono.
Turkish (TR): İnsanlık tüm uzayı araştırıp uzaylıların var olmadığını mükemmel bir şekilde gösterene kadar, onların var olmadığından emin olamazsınız.

Steam (ST): And it's definitely impossible for us to ever check the entirety of space for the existence of aliens.
Umineko Project (UP): And it's definitely impossible for us to ever check the entirety of space for the existence of aliens.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And it's definitely impossible for us to ever check the entirety of space for the existence of aliens.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、我々には全宇宙に宇宙人が存在しないことを確認するなど間違いなく不可能。
Russian (RU): И для нас уж точно невозможно полностью исследовать весь космос для установления существования пришельцев.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E definitivamente é impossível para nós até checar a totalidade do espaço pela existência de alienígenas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而且，我們毫無疑問也不可能去證實全宇宙都不存在外星人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而且，我们毫无疑问也不可能去证实全宇宙都不存在外星人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E di certo ci è impossibile cercare interamente in tutto l'universo l'esistenza degli alieni.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): E sicuramente per noi è impossibile verificare l'inesistenza di extraterrestri in tutto l'universo...
Turkish (TR): Ve uzayın tamamını uzaylıların varlığı için kontrol etmemiz kesinlikle imkansızdır.

Steam (ST): ...Therefore, while there may be a number of ways to prove that aliens do exist, it will always be impossible to show proof that denies their existence.
Umineko Project (UP): ...Therefore, while there may be a number of ways to prove that aliens do exist, it is impossible to show proof that denies their existence.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …だから、宇宙人の存在を証明する余地は数あれど、その存在を否定する証明はありえないのだ。
Russian (RU): ...Таким образом, в то время как может иметься несколько способов для доказательства существования пришельцев, у нас отсутствуют доказательства отрицания их существования.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Logo, enquanto possa haver um número de formas de provar que alienígenas existem, é impossível mostrar uma prova que negue a existência deles.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …因此，雖然證明外星人存在的餘地屈指可數，然而要否定它的存在，卻是不可能證明得了的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …因此，虽然证明外星人存在的余地屈指可数，然而要否定它的存在，却是不可能证明得了的。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Pertanto, mentre ci possono essere vari modi per provare che gli alieni esistono, è impossibile mostrare prove che negano la loro esistenza.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Pertanto, sebbene ci possano essere vari modi per provare l'esistenza degli alieni, è impossibile mostrare prove che la negano.
Turkish (TR): ...Bu nedenle, uzaylıların var olduğunu kanıtlamanın çeşitli yolları olsa da, varlıklarını inkâr eden bir kanıt göstermek imkansızdır.

Speaker: Ushiromiya George
Steam (ST): "...So, any discussion about there being a second boat would just be a waste of our time. ...She wasn't on the boat with us. That much is a fact, so she must've arrived on this island through some other means."
Umineko Project (UP): "......In that case, we would just be wasting our time discussing whether or not a boat separate from the one we rode on came to the island. ......She wasn't on the boat with us. That much is a fact, and she must have visited this island through some other means."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......In that case, even if we discuss whether a boat separate from the one we rode on came to the island, we would just be wasting our time. ......She wasn't on the boat with us. That much is a fact, and she visited this island through some other means."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……となれば、僕たちが乗ってきた船以外の船で来たかどうかなんて、議論しても無駄な問題ということになるね。……僕たちと一緒の船にはいなかった。それだけが事実で、それ以外の方法で、とにかくこの島に訪れたことになる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……となれば、僕たちが乗ってきた船以外の船で来たかどうかなんて、議論しても無駄な問題ということになるね。……僕たちと一緒の船にはいなかった。それだけが事実で、それ以外の方法で、とにかくこの島に訪れたことになる」
Russian (RU): "......И в этом конкретном случае, даже если мы начнем обсуждать вопрос о другом катере помимо того, на котором мы прибыли на остров, мы лишь зря потратим время. ......Её не было вместе с нами на катере. Это неоспоримый факт, свидетельствующий о её прибытии на остров несколько иным путём."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Nesse caso, estaríamos só perdendo nosso tempo discutindo se um barco separado daquele em que viemos veio ou não para a ilha. ......Ela não estava no barco conosco. Esse tanto é um fato, e ela deve ter chegado nesta ilha através de algum outro meio."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……照這麼說，即便去討論她是不是乘別的船來的，也只是浪費時間啊。……她沒在我們乘的船上。只有這一點是事實，而她則是用了其他的方法，總之到了這座島上。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……照这么说，即便去讨论她是不是乘别的船来的，也只是浪费时间啊。……她没在我们乘的船上。只有这一点是事实，而她则是用了其他的方法，总之到了这座岛上。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... In questo caso, anche se discutiamo sul fatto che una barca si sia separata da quella che ci ha portati sull'isola, staremmo solo perdendo tempo. ... Lei non era nella barca con noi. Almeno questo è un dato di fatto, e quindi lei è arrivata sull'isola in qualche altra maniera."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "In tal caso, è inutile discutere se sia arrivata o meno con un battello diverso da quello su cui siamo saliti... Lei non era sul battello con noi. Questo è un dato di fatto, per cui è giunta su quest'isola in qualche altra maniera."
Turkish (TR): "......Bu durumda, bindiğimiz tekneden ayrı bir teknenin adaya gelip gelmediğini tartışarak zamanımızı boşa harcamış oluruz. ......O, bizimle birlikte teknede değildi. Bu kadarı kesin, ve o zaman adaya başka bir yolla gelmiş olmalı."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そうね。どうやって来たかなんて議論の必要はないかもしれない。肝心なのは、現にこの屋敷に今いて、私たちと晩餐を共にする気がないという事実よ」

Steam (ST): ...From his seat in the farthest corner, he had been calmly watching the whole discussion without butting in. ...Surely, that reaction of his was very adult, just what you'd expect of a calm, old gentleman.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi

Steam (ST): George's words had completely restored Maria's good mood, and now she took the initiative, telling the others to head on to the guesthouse.
